SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there, bud.
What's the deal here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien is in our midst! It's been a
great many cycles since an outsider last
visited us, so I suppose I could spare the
time to explain our 'deal,' as you put it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_020.text:
This is the laboratory of Green Division,
where we research various forms of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_030.text:
Seen any unusual life-forms lately?
Like spirits, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_040.text:
The research of fiends and monsters
falls under the purview of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_050.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_060.text:
In fact, all the food, medical supplies,
and biologically derived fuels consumed
within the base are created here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_070.text:
Geez, this sounds like a whole lot
more than just a research facility.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_080.text:
Yes, although research remains our division's
primary mission—which is why we have little
time to waste engaging with aliens.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_090.text:
Currently, I am only speaking with you because
I have an idle moment while I await the receipt
of some quantum cat specimens. Speaking of
which, why haven't they arrived yet?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_100.text:
A quantum cat? Never heard of
that kind of kitty before.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_110.text:
Not to imply that I don't trust you, alien,
but we have valuable research samples
under our care, so I would ask you not to
go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_120.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_001_CUT_000_130.text:
Yeah, gonna take a pass on that.
But hey, thanks for the talk.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes. I, um... Well, I actually wanted
to ask you a favor? Kind of?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, I'm one of the researchers
from Green Division, by the way.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
You're the folks all about
biological research, yeah? Well, if this favor involves cutting me open
and taking a look at all the goo inside,
I'm gonna have to say no.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
What? Oh no! Nothing like that!
The favor actually involves catching
some quantum cats that ran away
from me down on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Quantum cats...? Oh yeah, guess I did hear
something about those. So you want me to
head down below and round 'em up, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Exactly! Those naughty cats ran away just as
I was preparing them for an experiment.
And if my division overseer hears of this...
Oh, I don't even want to think about it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, I was just chattin' with that lady.
Guess she did come off as a bit of a
whip-cracker, if I'm being honest.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_090.text: I can't even imagine what she might do if she found out I lost her cats!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_091.text:
Last time I screwed up, she made me participate in
an experiment involving an elixir that was supposed
to make you smart, but I'm so dumb that not even
that could—wait, that doesn't matter right now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Quantum cats, right? I suppose I am a little
curious to see one of them, so why don't
you tell me what I'm looking for here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
There are two escaped cats: one named
Schrö, and the other named Dinger. But there is also only one escaped cat.
They are multiple, yet singular.
Deathless, yet not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Quantum cats possess a mimetic ability
that causes other life-forms around them
to assume their appearance. As such, we have reports that the cat—
or cats—are hiding among fiends who now
ALSO appear to be quantum cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I asked a couple other lab workers to help
me capture the cats—er, or cat—but they all
ended up being attacked by monsters.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
So this place is basically being haunted
by shapeshifting kitties? Gosh, this whole
deal sounds real exciting.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
According to our research, quantum cats
are influenced by magnetic fields.
They cause real cats to face to the right,
and illusory cats to face to the left.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Yowza. If you've got that much science
in the mix, maybe these aren't your
garden-variety shapeshifting cats.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Yes, well, now that I've explained all of that,
I'm coming with you. You wouldn't be able to
use the lift without me, is the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_171.text:
Oh, and my name's Qu Magis,
but you can call me Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Sounds good to this guy, Mags.
Let's go catch us some kitties.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, I see a kitty! That's gotta be
one of your quantum cats, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Did you verify which direction
it was facing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Fella was looking right... I think?
Or maybe left? Ah geez, which was it?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text: Better skip this one for now.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_000.text:
So this fuzzball we caught here
is one of your quantum cats?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_010.text:
It says 'Dinger' on its collar,
so it must be. Oh, what a relief
that we caught the right cat!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_020.text:
Seems like a real nice kitty to me.
Not trying to scratch or nothin'.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_030.text: Ah, but the quantum cat you see isn't real. It's the cat you don't perceive that is the actual cat—one living on the boundary between dimensions.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_040.text:
Hang on there, bud. Are you saying that our
looking at this cat makes it so you can't
catch it? 'Cause I'm pretty sure I caught
the dang thing already, so how's that work?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_050.text:
It's the collar. It's made of orichalcum,
which for some reason makes it possible
to interact with quantum cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_060.text:
And your Green Division is
researching these critters?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh yes! We have much to learn from them.
Why, they could easily lead to a new era
of massive technological discoveries!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_090.text:
Exactly! Er, why else did you think
we were researching life-forms?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_100.text:
Gosh, no idea. Secrets of longevity?
Or even immortality, maybe?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_110.text:
Oooh, that's a great guess!
Yeah, I've kind of got the same hunch
that might be the end goal in all this.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_120.text:
...Hunch? You mean you
don't actually know!?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_130.text:
Honestly, though? I don't think being
immortal would be very much fun.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_002_CUT_000_140.text:
Whatever you say, bud. Now howzabout
we go find your other missing kitty?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's see... The collar says 'Schrö'!
Oh, wow, what a relief.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It's a real cutie, even if it does
look identical to Dinger.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text: Well, they are the same cat, after all. There's two of them, yet just one. Dead, yet living. Existing, yet not.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
So what's Green Division researching
with these critters, anyway?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
The fact they exist as a single cat and yet
two cats means they exist in a quantum state—
and are therefore connected at a quantum-
mechanical level.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Can't say I followed any of that,
but good on you if you get it.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
I think we're doing something like trying to
control their state with orichalcum—to find out
if it's structured in a way that we can extract
energy from them without it diminishing?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
Sounds like you don't really
get it either, Mags.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_090.text:
Ha ha! Oh, I don't have the faintest
idea about most of this stuff.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_100.text:
And yet we somehow managed to
catch 'em both. Not bad, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, and I guess the monsters
are gone now, too?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_120.text:
Indeed they are. This is because the
influence of the cats' quantum field
has dissipated.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_130.text:
Heck, bud! You and me just solved
the mystery of the Delta Base
sci-fi shapeshifter-kitty kerfuffle!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll go back to the lab and
drop off the cat... Er, or cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_150.text:
Hope that snarly overseer
lady goes easy on you.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_003_CUT_000_160.text:
Guess I should be
getting back too...

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_000.text:
You said this was some kind of mimicry,
but those monsters didn't look much
like cats to me.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_010.text:
Yes, they seem to be projecting their
existence through space-time? That's why
it changes their left-right directionality.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_020.text:
We speak of the cats in the multiple,
but in truth, they're singular.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_030.text: And it's possible that anyone other than the two of us would actually perceive us as cats.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_005_040.text:
Boy, I ain't got a furball's chance
in heck of following any of that.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_000.text:
Guess that was one of those
mimetic monsters, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_020.text:
Sure wish we could just lure 'em
to us with catnip or something.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_006_040.text:
Catnip? It's an herb that makes kitties
go all wonky. Heck, I thought you folks
were supposed to be biologists.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_000.text:
Guess that was one of those
mimetic monsters, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_010.text:
It sure was. Now let's get moving
and find those quantum cats!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_020.text:
Before your overseer
blows her top, yeah?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_007_030.text:
Oh, you have no idea.
She is terrifying.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_000.text:
Guess that was one of those
mimetic monsters, eh?

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_010.text:
The cats really did manage to project
their appearance onto the monsters...

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_020.text: It makes me wonder if quantum cats are simply creatures onto which normal cats have projected their appearances.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_030.text:
Well, gosh. If you start thinking like that,
you sorta lose all concept of what they
actually look like.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_CAT_01_001_CUT_008_040.text:
But it DOES make for a very
interesting thought exercise!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
You get those quantum cats back
where they needed to be?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
I did, thanks to you. Now our biological
research can move forward without issue.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
But, um, seeing as you were such a helpful
alien, do you think I could maybe ask you
for another favor? I mean, if I need it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_01_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Hey, you just lemme know
the deal and I'll consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_000.text: A passcode? Where did you get that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Just found it somewhere.
Why, is it important?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
That's a passcode for unlocking one of
the cryosleep pods on the lower floor—
and a rather old one, at that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Pod 007, is it? Yes, it seems a patient in that
pod has been waiting for a medical treatment
to be developed since...cycle 31!? By atoms,
it must be one of the progenitors!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_050.text: It's one of the what now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
A member of the generation that established
Delta Base. Why, someone from that time would
likely know the answers to all the great
mysteries of this place!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_080.text:
May I take this code, alien? A medical treatment
for this patient's condition has long since been
developed, but I don't dare thaw a progenitor
without first informing the Council of Overseers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Please, alien. Give me the code.
You've been quite helpful so far,
and it would sadden me if I had
to take it from you by force.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Well, seeing as you'd put up your dukes
if I said no, I guess it's all yours. But I got a favor to ask in return:
Tell me where this pod deal's located.
I wanna take a peek at this person who's
been snoozin' away all this time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_000_CUT_000_110.text:
All right. We'll consider it a reward
for your prompt cooperation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Good thing I thought to make a copy
of the code. But should I go ahead
and thaw whoever's in here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Nnngh... Is this...a cryopod?
Ah, I see. I've finally awakened.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_020.text:
I'll not let you dastards have your way!
Not now, and not ever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Whoa, hey there, guy!
Where you going!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_040.text:
Hoo boy. This might not
have been such a hot idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_050.text: What in the...? Pod 007 is open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_060.text: And it's empty! What's going on!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_020_CUT_000_080.text:
Don't know nothing, didn't see nothing.
Better believe that's how I'm playing
this one...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, so whatever happened with that cryosleep
pod dealie? Council of Overseers ever make
a decision on whoever's inside?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, the progenitor escaped
the pod and is currently missing. I don't suppose YOU know
anything about this, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_020.text: What, me? Heck no, not a thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_030.text:
A shame. For if we do not find the progenitor
soon, their ailment will progress to the point
where treatment is no longer possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_040.text: Well, sure hope you track 'em down.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_021_CUT_000_050.text:
Cripes, this ain't good.
I better go find that pod fella.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_010.text:
The cryosleep pod of a progenitor?
Boy, you've really poked the damn
hornet's nest this time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_020.text:
This could threaten everything
that Delta Base has become.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_030.text:
And yet, the person inside that pod could be
the only living witness to Delta Base's history.
Their cultural and historical value is a thing
beyond all measure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Which is why I propose that the
Council of Overseers leave them
frozen here indefinitely.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Then Administrative Division will
take the appropriate measures.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Understood. I will see to it that
their cryosleep is not interrupted.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_080.text:
I have also changed the passcode
as a security precaution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_030_CUT_000_090.text:
They changed the passcode!?
Well, dang. I shoulda opened the
dang thing while I had the chance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_000.text:
Say, you're that fella who
was in cryosleep, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_010.text:
And you are the one who awakened me.
You have my thanks, for at long last,
I can now resume my work.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_020.text:
Hold on just a minute there, guy.
That's the Connectivity Gate.
Where you headed, exactly?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: Man_Overworld_Battle
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_04_031_CUT_000_030.text:
To the Conjoined Worlds,
where my task awaits me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there. So is this some kind
of laboratory or something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_010.text:
Ah, the alien. Thankfully, we have a researcher
whose duties include interfacing with those
from outside the division, so let me just... Oh, bother. I don't see her anywhere. Tsk!
Well then, I guess it falls to me, the
overseer of the entire Green Division,
to assuage your idle curiosity... Joy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_020.text:
Yeah, no, that's all right. You don't have
to go taking a bunch of time out of your
busy day just for this guy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_030.text:
Just make sure you pay attention!
Now then, we in Green Division
conduct biological research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_040.text:
Our field is a broad one, spanning everything
from the life-forms that live here on Delta Base
to the interdimensional beings that exist in
the space between worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_050.text:
We cover everything from organic chemistry to
life sciences to particle physics, and demand
an incredibly wide breadth of knowledge—
certainly the largest in all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_060.text:
Sounds like you're researching
some real advanced stuff there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_070.text:
Just so, which is why I'm proud to say every
member of Green Division is an exceptional
researcher! ...Well, save for a small few.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_090.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_005_CUT_000_100.text:
Yeah, gonna take a pass on that and
just come back some other time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: Oops! Oh dear, I'm so sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
You all right there, bud? Looks like
you're in one heck of a hurry.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, it's nothing. Or, well... Okay, here it is: on the lower level, we're
currently cultivating and researching these
otherworldly vegetables called monophids
that we use to make food and medicine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
I take it these otherworldly veggies
are different from the normal kind?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh, very much so. In fact, you have to
be REALLY careful with the type and
amount of fertilizer you give them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But I sort of...didn't do that?
And now they've turned into monsters
that are propagating exponentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Considering their current rate of growth,
they'll soon overrun the entire lower level!
And if Green Division's overseer happens
to find out about this...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Oh, I can't even imagine what she'll do!
Last time I messed up, she injected me with
an experimental mushroom extract that was
supposed to let you go days without sleep! And the time before that, she...
Well, you get the idea.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
But say, you're an alien, right? Would you 
be willing to help me exterminate our now
rapidly expanding monophid population?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Well, I don't think a bunch of vegetables runnin'
amok has heck-all to do with spirits, but since
fate's clearly brought you and me together,
I'll help out and see where it takes me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Thank you so much! Oh, and I should mention
that the monophids have developed an abnormal
property in which they scream when they perceive
danger. So, um, be careful of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Sorry, you want me to chase down a bunch
of cucumbers that scream? This whole deal
sounds like more trouble than it's worth...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh, it's all kinds of trouble! In fact,
according to past records, all the research 
teams that tried to deal with these kinds
of infestations suffered MASSIVE casualties.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Still, if we could emit something at the same
wavelength as the monophids' screams,
we might be able to cancel them out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Well, there you go! They got a weakness.
We just need to exploit it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Sounds good to this guy, Mags. Oh geez, saying that just dislodged
a memory from the old noggin—sorta
like some kind of deja vu, maybe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Cripes, bud! If those veggies scream
any louder, they're gonna blow my
ears right outta my dang skull!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I thought I was prepared for it,
but it still feels like my head
is splitting apart!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
I mean, how does a plant scream!?
It doesn't make any sense!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_000.text: So these are the monophids, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Looks like they were screaming
and it got canceled out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_011_CUT_000_020.text: We should be able to gather them now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_000.text:
Well, that's one down. But if you
don't mind my asking, what are you
researching these veggies for, anyway?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Screaming aside, monophids have a lot
of vitality—and their seeds are quite
rich in various nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Okay, but is that really worth
the risk of growing the things?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, this time it was my own dumb fault
for messing up the fertilizer. And the
reproductivity was probably a result of
all the selective breeding! Heh heh...heh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_040.text:
But do you know why Green Division is
trying to uncover the secrets of life?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_080.text:
Even if they did find some way,
it'd probably require a weird surgery.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_012_CUT_000_100.text:
Nooo, don't even joke about that!
Let's just hurry on, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Those dang monophids
are screaming again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Even when I know it's coming,
it still disturbs me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, so don't let anyone know
I told you this, but...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_030.text:
As far as I know, this is the first time
we've dealt with an outsider like you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_040.text:
But on the lower level, there's apparently
someone who isn't a member of Green Division
or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_050.text:
Like a ghost or something, I guess.
And while I kind of want to see them,
I also kind of...don't?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_060.text:
So a researcher from the life sciences
division believes in ghosts, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_070.text:
Look, I just want to get that last
monophid before the ghost appears!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_022_CUT_000_080.text:
I dunno, bud. This place doesn't
seem all that haunted to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Okay, I've had enough of these overgrown
eggplants and all their dang screaming!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Actually, I think there's a part of
me that's starting to enjoy it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, now that you mention it...
Wait, no! That's not going to
happen in a billion dang years!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_020.text:
I didn't want to mention this earlier,
but a colleague of mine was actually
killed by one of the monophids.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_030.text:
Golly, Mags, I had no idea.
Those things really are dangerous, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Yeah, I didn't want to worry you while we were
hunting them down. Er, but now that I know you,
I bet you would have helped me even if you HAD
known, 'cause that's the kind of alien you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_032_CUT_000_050.text:
Heck, bud. When you frame it like that,
not sure what other answer I could give.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Well, I've got a lot of processing to do
on these guys, so I'm going to head back
to the upper level. Thanks again, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_040_CUT_000_030.text: Eh, maybe I'll head up too.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you so much for helping me
with that whole monophid thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_010.text:
We only managed to recover one of them,
but that's still one more than none!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Um, so if anything else goes wrong,
can I ask for your help again?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Hey, you just lemme know
the deal and I'll consider it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Thanks. Oh, and here's your reward
for helping me out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_051_CUT_000_010.text:
We managed to recover two monophids.
That's wonderful!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_052_CUT_000_010.text:
We recovered all the monophids,
which should ensure that we're able
to go forward with our research.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_010.text:
Sadly, we had to eradicate all the monophids,
but I'll try to recover the specimens from
the carcasses; we grew them in good soil,
so even dead, they're full of nutrients.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_05_053_CUT_000_040.text:
I guess this turned out to be more about
exterminating monophids than recovering them.
But hey, you still get a reward for that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there, bud. Mind if I ask what goes
on in this sketchy research facility
you've got here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, look. It's the alien. Also, what you consider to be 'sketchy' is,
in fact, reputable and cutting-edge research
spanning everything from the life sciences
to quantum mechanics.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_020.text:
And does that reputable research
ever involve spirits, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_030.text:
The research of fiends, monsters,
and the like falls under the purview
of Red Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_040.text:
We in Green Division collect unusual life-forms
from various worlds, as well as flora and fauna
with medicinal properties. We also pursue
research into the fundaments of life itself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_050.text:
But our research is not merely academic
in nature; we are equally devoted to
researching practical ways to improve
the quality of life here in Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_060.text:
Geez, this sounds like a whole lot
more than just a research facility.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_070.text:
Quite right. Green Division's researchers
are the best of the best, and they undertake
their work with meticulous care.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_080.text:
Now then, alien. As we have valuable research
samples under our care, I would ask you not
to go traipsing about the area.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_090.text:
In fact, I'm planning to begin an experiment
involving some new specimens shortly—
assuming they ever arrive, that is.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_100.text: I do hope there hasn't been another mistake. Ugh. I've half a mind to make a research specimen out of her one of these days...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_110.text:
Alternatively, if you would consent to our
examining you, injecting you with chemicals,
and then dissecting you, I'm certain there's
much of interest we could learn.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_120.text:
Yeah, gonna take a pass on that
and just swing by some other time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_00_006_CUT_000_130.text: See to it that you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Looks like your jar broke there.
You didn't get cut, did you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh no! They escaped!
The tsuchinoko have escaped!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Now hold on just a second, bud.
You folks got tsuchinoko around here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Heck yeah I do! They're the king of the
cryptids—also known as the bachi-hebi.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
And you had 'em in that jar there
and now they're nowhere to be seen.
That about cover it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
That's it. But the bigger problem is that
I'm a researcher for Green Division,
and if the overseer finds out I lost
our tsuchinoko specimens...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Yes, exactly! Why, just the other day, 
she almost made me do a gene transplant
with an electric eel!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Er, but I guess that's beside the point.
Will you please help me recover them?
I mean, it WAS kind of your fault.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
There were three specimens in the jar,
and they probably fled to the lower level.
Don't worry, I'll come with you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Also, tsuchinoko snore when they sleep,
so that'll be the easiest time to try
and recapture them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Here, let me activate that
lift over there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I'm real sorry about this, Mags,
but I swear I'll make it up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Criminy, that really
IS a tsuchinoko!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_040.text: Should we still go for it?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_100_CUT_000_060.text: Eh, best to let it be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_000.text:
Cripes, I've never seen an
actual tsuchinoko before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_110_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Heck yeah! We caught
ourselves a tsuchinoko!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
But we still have two to go.
I'm counting on you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
So what do you use these
tsuchinoko for, anyway?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Never mind that. Listen, do you find it
at all strange that you ALSO call these
creatures tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, it would be proof that they exist
on multiple worlds—and yet, there are
no records of anyone ever releasing them
into another world!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_060.text:
I suppose they might jump into other dimensions
when they sense danger? I mean, that would also
explain why we haven't been able to get accurate
data on their native habitat or population.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah, but the name thing would still be weird.
I mean, it's not like they tell everybody
what to call 'em every time they decide
to swing by some new world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, perhaps our habit of calling them tsuchinoko
spread to other worlds—or maybe a member of the
civilization that named them found their way here.
Either explanation could work, honestly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_090.text:
And if some sort of internal organ allows them to
jump between dimensions instead of magic or tech,
it would be possible for the same population to
exist on multiple worlds at once.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_100.text:
So you're saying these fat little
critters have warp devices inside 'em?
Well, shoot. Who knew?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_110.text:
If the same individual tsuchinoko truly did
exist on multiple worlds at once, that would
make them living, breathing, interdimensional
teleportation devices!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_120.text:
And THAT means researching their species
could provide valuable clues for the
development of teleportation technology!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_130.text:
Wow, these tsuchinoko fellas are a
way bigger deal than I imagined. You're pretty incredible, Mags. I can't
imagine researching stuff like this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_140.text:
Aw, thank you so much
for saying that! You know, if we ever do get our
interdimensional teleportation up
and running, I'd love to visit your
world one day, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_150.text:
And I'd love to show you
around Miyako City.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_000_160.text:
Also, I know I'm always going on about
myself, but I really would like to hear
more about your world next time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_120_CUT_010_000.text:
Heh. That's a tsuchinoko for you.
Little guys sure are squirrely!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, look! A tsuchinoko!
I mean, that IS one, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_200_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching this
guy without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_210_CUT_000_030.text: This is our chance to grab it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_000.text:
Caught another tsuchinoko! Gosh,
I sure would love to take one of
these little guys home with me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_040.text:
So, um, alien? Were you serious about
wanting to keep one of these?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_050.text:
I mean, kinda? See, on my world, they're
considered a type of cryptid, which basically
means it's a creature that folks aren't quite
sure if it actually exists or not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_060.text:
I see. Sadly, these specimens are very precious
to us, so we can't let you take one with you.
Also, no photographs, flash or otherwise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_070.text:
Yeah, ain't that always the case with critters
like this? You never get a picture—just some
wide-eyed fella screaming to whoever'll listen
about what he just saw.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_080.text:
Er, are you all right, alien?
You're mumbling. A lot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_220_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm good, bud. Let's just
move on to the next one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_300_CUT_000_030.text:
No way we're catching it
without a fight now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_310_CUT_000_030.text:
Then this could be our
chance to catch it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_000.text:
That's one more tsuchinoko in the bag—
and also the last of 'em, right? I sure hope so, 'cause I'm more
beat than a twelve-egg omelette.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_320_CUT_000_010.text:
Yep! We're all done. Now I'm gonna
run on up and get these processed,
so I'll see you later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks again for your help
with the tsuchinoko.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Heck, it was the least I could
do after I busted up your jar. Also, it was pretty swell to see an actual
tsuchinoko! I mean, they even made a manga
about 'em and everything where I'm from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_020.text:
Is manga a form of cultural expression
on your world? If so, I would very much
like to see one someday.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_400_CUT_000_030.text:
You folks don't have manga here?
Yeah, I guess you wouldn't. Oh, so by the way, were you able
to get whatever it was you needed
from the tsuchinoko?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_000.text:
We were able to capture all
three in healthy condition.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_010.text:
Snatching 'em up while they snored
was a heck of a plan there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_020.text:
I'm just glad our research into the life
of the tsuchinoko can proceed smoothly.
Thanks again for the help!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_500_CUT_000_030.text:
Like I said, it was the least I could do.
I'm just glad this got resolved without
the boss lady catching wise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_000.text:
Not all of them made it
back to us unharmed...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sorry about that.
Fellas got a bit snarly there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, I don't think that should have
a significant effect on our research.
Thank you for your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_600_CUT_000_030.text:
Like I said, it was the least I could do.
I'm just glad this got resolved without
the boss lady catching wise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_000.text:
The three of them are all
a little bit beaten up...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, those fellas put up more
of a fight than I'd expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_020.text:
Still, it's not like we had a choice,
so thanks all the same, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_06_700_CUT_000_030.text:
Like I said, it was the least I could do.
I'm just glad this got resolved without
the boss lady catching wise.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thank you for helping to retrieve those
rare specimens, alien. All of us in Green
Division owe you a debt.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_010.text: Oh, geez. You know about that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
I do—and I apologize for the trouble
my researcher Qu Magis caused for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Um... Thank you for
your help, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The overseer was quite furious with me.
She made it clear that since my negligence
put all of Delta Base at risk, I should have
reported the incident to her immediately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
On that topic, alien, I wonder if you
might be willing to join us for a
selective-breeding experiment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Afraid I'm sorta perfect as I am,
so I'm gonna pass on being your
selective-breeding test subject.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
This is not about breeding you, alien.
We're seeking to fuse the specimens
you helped recover with a magical bee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We intend to fuse their individual
characteristics to create a new
and beneficial life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: As I would hate for your impression of Green Division to be tainted by certain members of our research team, you may consider this a chance to see the kind of work we really do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Well, when you put it like that,
I suppose I wouldn't mind a little
peek behind the ol' curtain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_07_015_CUT_000_000.text:
Then please go observe our experiment.
You can find it on the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Beginning selective-breeding verification
experiment A, iteration 880.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to use the inherent abilities
of quantum cats to increase the bee's
propagation rate and honey production.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
We once more stand at the brink of
uncovering a core mystery of nature
and enriching our own way of life.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
So you folks just sorta smoosh living
critters together? And that's okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_040.text:
We can instantly create new life-forms
by combining specimens that have been
placed in these fusion pods.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_050.text:
And by applying our teleportation
technology, we turn them into a
new, single being!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the quantum cat and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_070.text:
When you hear the pod ding,
the work will be complete.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, as experiments go, this one sounds
awful simple. You sure it's gonna work?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
WE MUST       WE WILL
     TURN THIS   INTO
   NEST

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Oh no... No no no no no... Not good! We overshot the domesticity
level and made it intelligent!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Creature_303
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
KREE KREE KREE.
FLEE FROM US.
FLEE. FLEE. FLEE.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
So on a scale of complete success to
utter failure... Maybe a six? Anyway, this is getting dangerous!
Let's get out of here!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Boy, I am really starting to regret
not just grabbing my spirit and
beating feet outta this place...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the medicinal properties
of monophids and propagation rates of
honeybees, as well as increasing the
yields of honey and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_100_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic
elements of the monophid and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_010.text:
Our goal is to boost the special faculties of
tsuchinoko and propagation rates of honeybees,
as well as increasing the yields of honey
and so forth.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_200_CUT_000_060.text:
I've begun combining the genetic elements
of the tsuchinoko and honeybee.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_000.text:
I'm not sure what went wrong, but they
appear to have fused into a rather
dangerous-looking creature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_010.text:
...Mags? What culture solution
did you use in the pods?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_030.text:
My instructions were to use formulation 098.
But sadly, I cannot afford to waste
precious time chastising you now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_040.text:
It is possible the specimens have begun
constructing a hive on the lower floor.
Should they gain even more intelligence,
it could put all of Delta Base in danger.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_050.text:
Also, we need to give our new
life-form a name! Um, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Our target is a failed experiment officially
designated as 'Rogue Species 303.'
We in Green Division must find some way
to respond to the danger this swarm poses.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_070.text:
Not that I'm a pro at this kind of thing,
but since this new critter is a danger to
everybody, wouldn't it make sense to maybe
bring the other divisions up to speed?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_080.text:
He's right! I mean, Red Division DOES
pride itself on handling odd life-forms.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_090.text:
*sigh* I suppose Green Division cannot
permit our pride to get in the way of
our greater responsibility. We must confer with Red Division.
Are you up to the task, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_100.text: Yeah, um, I don't... I mean, I'm not... No? Er, that is to say, I'm not entirely sure I'd be capable of having a productive conversation with Red Division, considering how, you know... scary they are? I mean, they're basically the war division of Delta Base, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_110.text:
No worries, bud—I'll tag along with you.
I mean, I'm up to my neck in this thing
anyhow, plus I've sorta gotten familiar
with all the particulars.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_000_CUT_010_120.text: Very well, alien. Good luck. And as for you, Mags, I expect you to make yourself extremely useful. In the meantime, I will remain here and continue to monitor Rogue Species 303. Dismissed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_000.text:
We have been briefed by Red Division's
overseer. We know Delta Base is in
trouble due to Rogue Species 303.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_010.text:
Um, well, I guess our fusion of a new life-form
miiight have caused some unexpected genes to
manifest? Ones that draw quite strongly from
the honeybee side of its genetic composition?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_020.text:
There's gotta be a way to stop the thing.
I mean, heck, why don't we just pump a
bunch of bug spray through the air ducts?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_030.text:
Unfortunately, we don't know how a rogue
species might react to insecticide. If we
inadvertently made them stronger, they could
easily end up being completely unmanageable.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_040.text:
So we gotta swat 'em one by one?
Can't say I'm in love with that plan.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_050.text:
A life-form of this type will have a queen.
Kill this queen. This will stop them.
Their proliferation will cease, halting
any further infiltration of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, but the thing is, we've yet to...
observe a queen? Or anything like one? I mean, it's also possible our security
cameras are just too far away for us
to make that kind of distinction!
That could be it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_070.text:
Well, much as this guy doesn't really want to
fight through a swarm of bugs looking for some
queen, sounds like that's what we need to do.
This is gonna be a tough fight, boy howdy...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_080.text:
You need pheromones. Apply them to yourself.
This will cause the life-forms to accept you
as an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_011_CUT_000_090.text:
Good idea! We used formulation 507
for the culture solution, so we should
be able to make a pheromone out of the
monster specimens we derived it from.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_000.text:
I have applied the pheromones.
Rogue Species 303 will now
consider you an ally.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_010.text:
Heck, I smell like somebody left a cheese
wheel out in the sun for a week.
I thought pheromones were supposed
to smell nice, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, you're not smelling the pheromone!
You're actually smelling the bodily fluids 
of the monster specimen it was derived from. Er, which is its urine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_030.text:
Sure wish I would've known that
before you smeared it all over me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_040.text:
Red Division hopes you succeed.
If you do not, we have a failsafe.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_050.text:
If we DO botch this, our standing in
Delta Base would plummet! And since
I'm the one who caused all this trouble,
I'd have no choice but to resign.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_060.text:
Why do you do this, alien?
This is not your burden.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_070.text:
What can I say? I just sorta hopped on the
bandwagon as it rolled by... Also just now
realizing you Delta Base fellas don't use wagons,
so you probably don't follow my meaning. I've just been along for the ride,
is what I'm saying.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_012_CUT_000_080.text:
I sympathize with your fate, alien.
Good luck. Return victorious.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_010.text:
The pheromone is tricking
their sensory organs!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_020.text: So they see us as allies, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_000_040.text:
Huh. I guess there's no
queen around here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_001_010.text:
This pheromone thing's
really doing the trick!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_010.text:
Uh-oh. These bug fellas aren't reacting
like they did before. You think the stink's
wearing off, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_016_CUT_002_040.text:
Well, cripes. They've got us surrounded.
There's no stinkin' our way outta this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_000.text:
That should be all of them, but I guess
the queen wasn't here after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_010.text:
Hold on just one second there, bud.
You hear that buzzing?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_017_CUT_000_020.text:
It's the queen! She must have received
a signal that we killed her underlings!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_000.text:
...And we also swatted all the queen's
underlings, so this whole deal should
be in the rearview now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_010.text:
Thank you for your assistance, alien.
It is much appreciated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_020.text:
And what have you learned of
Rogue Species 303, Mags?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, tons! And I also documented
everything, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_040.text:
Then perhaps we can consider this
experiment a stepping stone rather
than a failure.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_050.text:
Sounds like nobody learned a darn thing from
this mess. Guess that's just how a person's
gotta be if they want to succeed in science.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_080.text: Apologies. It is me. Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_090.text:
Come on, guy!
Don't scare me like that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_100.text:
I have a message, Madam Overseer.
The other division overseers await
your report on this incident.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_110.text:
Understood. Then I guess this
is farewell for now, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_120.text:
This whole thing was my fault.
I'm so, so, so, SOOO sorry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_130.text:
Not like you to be quite
so contrite, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, you noticed that too, alien?
Yeah, my boss sorta...ordered me
to apologize to you? But now that everything worked out,
I don't regret a thing. Plus, I'm sure
all the excitement has made your visit
to Delta Base really fun!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_150.text:
You showed me a real good time, all right.
But there's still one more thing I gotta
do in this place.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_160.text:
Oh, right! Spirits! Well, there's all manner of strange things
on the lower level, so I'm sure you'll
find one there. Good luck!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_300_CUT_000_170.text:
All that and you're not even gonna
offer to help a guy look? Sheesh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_000.text:
I understand you've had to endure much
due to Mags's procedural and general
incompetence, alien, and I apologize.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_010.text:
Eh, I bet incidents like that shake up
the monotony and make life on Delta Base
a heck of a lot more interesting.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_020.text:
And speaking of life on Delta Base,
you'd be welcome in Green Division
should you choose to remain here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_030.text:
But on another topic, while we were dealing
with this latest incident, we learned there
is an individual confined on the lower level—
one that might even be an alien like yourself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_040.text:
No kidding? Maybe I should take that as
a warning to get the heck outta here.
I mean, unless you got other plans?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_050.text:
For Green Division's part, we have only
gratitude for your work here and wouldn't
dream of apprehending you. But I can't speak to the plans of
the other divisions, so it would
behoove you to show caution.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_LIF_08_400_CUT_000_060.text:
Regardless, I will make arrangements
for you to meet this other alien.
Whether or not you do so is up to you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_010.text: Can't say I love being called that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, hell! Sorry about that—didn't mean
to offend. In fact, I've actually been
waiting for you to show up! So this is the research area of Red Division.
I'm the division overseer, and this is my
data-management specialist, Shi Kat.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Good to meetcha. Er, but what's
with this 'waiting for me' deal?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Relax, alien! We'll get to that. Right then! So Red Division is currently
engaged in the collection of life-form data
from numerous worlds. Dangerous life-forms
in particular. Monsters, essentially.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_050.text: See, the examiners and researchers of Delta Base have been dispatched to all sorts of worlds filled with all kinds of nasty, toothy monsters. It's Red Division's job to gather data about said monsters and come up with countermeasures—and let me tell you, there is a ton of data to wrangle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I am Shi Kat. The data-wrangler.
The pitiless overseer is constantly
increasing my workload. I cannot begin
to estimate when I might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Ha ha ha! C'mon now, Kat! Let's not go
airing our dirty laundry to the alien! Now where was I...? Oh, right! Data. Yeah,
so once you understand a monster's nature,
you'll know whether fight or flight is the
best choice, and also how best to go about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Unknown monsters. Fiends. Phantoms.
These do we analyze. These do we classify.
There is science in turning knowledge
into usable data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_090.text:
We're well aware, thank you! *sigh*
Sorry about that, alien. My colleague
here tends to be a bit thickheaded.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Whatever you say, guy. Now let's get back
to the part where you're waiting for me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
