SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Oh, right! That! Okay, so when you
showed up here, it actually triggered
a momentary power failure that wiped out
vital portions of our monster-data library.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_130.text: Ha ha ha! You sure did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Anyway, since this is all your fault,
we need you to go to the lower level
and track down the biochip that has
our backup monster data on it. All we know is that it's inside a container,
but just open 'em all and I'm sure you'll
eventually run across it. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_150.text:
We can restore the erased
data with that biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I'll give you permission to take the lift
to the lower level. Oh, but be careful down
there! The electromagnetic gates have sorta
been on the fritz lately.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Aw, it's just a gate that delivers a
massively painful and dangerous electrical
shock whenever something touches it. We built the thing in case any of our
nastier research specimens ever got out.
Can't be too careful, am I right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_190.text:
And this electro-gate has gone haywire.
That also because of me, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Ha ha ha! It sure is! I mean, probably.
Anyway, safety first and all that, right?
Now good luck down there!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh hey, the biochip! Nice going!
Now we can restore that missing data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
You're just as good as I'd hoped, alien.
I knew you could do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, seeing as all this was my fault,
the least I could do was fix it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Ha ha ha! Man, what a sap. Now let's see
what details of the alien's physiology 
were collected by the biochip.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
It would seem he's far more
compatible than anticipated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, you really have
a knack for showing up exactly when
I want you to. I love it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Sounds like there's something else
you want from me, eh, fella?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 056 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 056.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 056.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 056
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_05.text:
I cannot fight the beast. I would be slain
before any useful data could be collected.
Please go in my place, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_06.text:
Well heck. Now I feel bad for the guy.
Still, I've come this far, so I might as
well get down there and finish it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Ha ha! Wonderful! You've met my
expectations once again, alien. Anyway, we'll handle all the data collection
and numbers and all that nerd stuff, so you
just worry about the fighting. Good? Good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 056 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You folks are building monsters?
Why the heck?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_10.text:
There are various goals we pursue.
Isolating beneficial characteristics.
Engaging in potential domestication.
So forth and so on.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Yes, yes, it's all simply fascinating.
Now enough with the idle chitchat!
Let's get on with the fighting!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Easy for you to say when you're
not the one hopping in the ring.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_000_CUT_000_13.text:
I know, right? Sadly, overseers aren't allowed
to fight. Too valuable, too hard to replace—
you know how it is right? Right. Sure you do.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is the pen where you got
Specimen 056 locked up, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_02.text:
C'mon, alien! Let's see some enthusiasm!
Hup, hup! Hoo-rah! Get 'er done!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_03.text:
This really what passes for leadership
with you Red Division folks?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_010_CUT_000_04.text:
I apologize. My failings led to this.
I wish you the best of luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 056!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_01.text:
Now get the data restored
already, Kat! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_03.text:
...For all his supposed compatibility,
he'd be useless to us if he couldn't
survive a battle of that intensity—so
I'm VERY glad to see he passed the test.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Still, the other divisions don't seem to know
what we're attempting here—or maybe they do
and are just granting consent through silence? Eh, whatever. He's my alien now,
and I'll do whatever I want with him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Uh, hey there, guy. Just realized
you never gave me my reward.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_07.text:
DIDN'T I? Well, that was dumb.
Probably Kat's fault, honestly,
because you certainly deserve one!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_08.text:
Cripes, what's with the creepy soliloquy?
I'm starting to think the overseer fella
is planning to exploit me for something. And not just me—I bet he's using all of
Red Division, and maybe even Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_020_CUT_000_09.text:
I should probably grab my spirit and get
the heck out of here quick as I can.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 098 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 098.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 098.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 098
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 098 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is the pen where you got
Specimen 098 locked up, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are—and we REALLY need
you to fight it so we can get our
first-encounter data.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_02.text:
I mean, you know how it is when there's a
gap in consecutively numbered files, right?
Drives you crazy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_010_CUT_000_03.text: Well, I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 098!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_02.text:
You know it! When we reviewed our newest
data, we learned that some information
regarding Monster Specimen 507 was lost.
Kat here can fill you in on the details.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_03.text:
You will kindly battle Specimen 507.
As you do, we will collect its data. You are the only one who can do this.
We require first-encounter data.
But every Red Division member has
already battled Specimen 507.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_04.text:
And there you have it! We've got Specimen 507
locked in a pen in the lower level, so just
get down there and get to thrashing it! Oh, and Kat? You're wrong about one thing:
there IS a member of Red Division who has
yet to fight the beast...and you know
JUST who I mean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I apologize for your being troubled on my behalf. 
Also, you should know this: Specimen 507 was not
captured in the wild. Instead, it was created in
a joint project with Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_00.text:
So this is the pen where you got
Specimen 507 locked up, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Right you are! Now get in there and smack
the thing in the face a few times so we
can finally complete our database, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_02.text:
Just how many monster specimens
do you fellas have, anyway?
At least 507, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Our numbering system is not indicative
of the total. Specimens are destroyed.
New varieties are discovered—including
cursed and artificially developed ones. I estimate there are roughly 75,000 in all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_04.text:
So if you got that many samples,
how come losing the data for
one or two is such a big deal?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Because it's only through the accumulation
of data that fundamental truths
become revealed! Sooo...the fighting? C'mon, let's go.
Very busy man over here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_010_CUT_000_06.text: Hey, I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh, well DONE, alien! I knew you wouldn't
let me down! Now we've got all the data
we need for Specimen 507!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Ho there, alien! Boy, am I ever in awe of
your knack for appearing at the right place
and at the right time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Not exactly. See, while we were attempting
to update our combat data on a particular
specimen, we experienced an unexpected
infestation of parasitic slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_04.text:
The slime mold is consuming all of our
monster specimens AND multiplying
at an almost unbelievable rate.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Thing is, most of Red Division has been sent
offworld on official business, and we don't
have the strength to fight it. And yeah, sure, we could ask the
other divisions for help, but yuck!
Who wants to do that? Not me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_06.text: Actually, I'm thinking that's exactly what you should be doing there, guy. I mean, any ol' port in a storm, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Noted. But in this case, the port
I have chosen is YOU, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_08.text:
I'm currently working up an analysis of the
slime mold's properties that I should have
finished up here shortly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_000_CUT_000_09.text:
So you're going to help us, right?
Sure you are!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, alien? How about it?
Will you help us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_01.text:
We have come to understand a few
aspects of the slime mold's nature.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_02.text:
We can obstruct its movements
with our electromagnetic gates.
These gates have been activated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_03.text:
You can deactivate individual gates
by using switches near containers.
However, they cannot be reactivated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, so our sensors picked up three swarms
of slimes. Or packs. Or, uh, whatever slimes
travel around in. Herds, maybe? Oh, and when this is all over,
there's a reward waiting for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_05.text:
Fella, I have a feeling you've got
something planned for me besides
just some reward...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_07.text:
Eh, never mind.
I'll take care of it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_002_CUT_000_08.text: Can I really trust these guys?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, this is just strange...
We've never seen this particular
variety of slime mold before!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_030_CUT_000_01.text: This should be the last of 'em!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierZ
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_00.text:
This slime mold looks like your everyday
garden-variety stuff, but it's actually
some sort of new species or subspecies.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_01.text:
A discovery of this nature must be
reported to the other divisions.
This is correct, yes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, Kat! You and your rules! Look, involving the other divisions
is only going to complicate things.
Bureaucracy, paperwork, infighting...
Blech, am I right!? I'll just handle it myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_03.text:
I dunno, guy. This seems like
a deal that affects everybody.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_04.text:
Look, outsider. There are all sorts of inter-
divisional tensions that you just don't get.
If I let them know about this, they'll see
us as weak—and I'm NOT letting that happen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_041_CUT_000_05.text:
Sounds like I've graduated
from alien to outsider.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_00.text:
We believe the slime mold has emerged from
the containment unit of Specimen 440,
Mr. Overseer, sir!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_01.text:
Specimen 440... Yes, of course.
Exactly as I suspected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierY
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_02.text:
The containment unit has been destroyed from
the inside, sir, and the slime mold seems to have
been feeding off of the specimen it contained.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_03.text:
We must report this at once.
Yellow Division must know.
Green Division must know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_04.text:
Slow down there, speedy!
We'll hold off on that report until we've
had time to conduct a full investigation.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_05.text:
Got some questions here, guy. Why'd you
say 'of course' it was Specimen 440?
What even is Specimen 440? Also, why
did you go and involve me in all this?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_06.text:
Well, I suppose you've earned
a few answers, my alien friend. Right as you arrived here, Specimen 440
woke up. But just as we were getting
ready to analyze its combat potential,
the slime mold infestation began.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_07.text:
We naturally suspected that your arrival
was connected to Specimen 440, but needed
actual evidence this was the case. And guess what? We were right!
The two are most definitely related.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_08.text:
Hey, I get why you think my being here triggered
all this, but you also said my coming here caused
a power outage. Couldn't that be the reason for
this whole deal, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_09.text:
Yes, that seems plausible. We were observing
whether or not the slime mold would react
to your presence, but so far we've seen
zero evidence of that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_10.text:
Anyway, that's why we're going to need your
continued participation for just a teensy
bit longer! You're good with that, right?
Sure you are.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_042_CUT_000_11.text:
Well, I got no interest in being jumped
by slime mold next time I'm pokin' around
the lower level, so probably best to just
deal with the stuff now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_SoldierX
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_00.text:
Sir, none of the characteristics of this
infestation match the data of known slime
molds in our database. I feel it would be
best to inform the other divisions.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_01.text:
I understand, soldier—well,
in the sense I acknowledge that
as your personal point of view.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_02.text:
Uh, thank you, sir? So should I issue
an official interdivisional report?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_05.text:
440 is a unique specimen,
and I'm not going to let the other
divisions start meddling with it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_06.text:
Why, if the specimen was destroyed,
all of my amazing plans for it
would amount to nothing!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_043_CUT_000_08.text:
These plans, alien, are something I hatched
before I even became overseer. They have
nothing to do with your appearance.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_00.text:
The slime molds are returning
to the containment unit!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_01.text:
I've confirmed the presence of Specimen 440.
Looks like that damn slime mold destroyed
the containment unit from the inside and
consumed all of its bodily tissue!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_02.text:
So this containment unit's
full of slime mold now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_03.text:
This unit contains a mummified human male.
The slime mold seems to be functioning as
tentacular appendages that are providing
nutrition to the mummy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_04.text:
Hey, so I'm not following this at all.
You folks got a mummy that's still alive,
and it's using slime mold to gather nutrients?
Sounds like a dang zombie to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_05.text:
Mmm, not quite. See, the slime mold activity was
a clear sign the mummy was preparing to rise
from its slumber—we just didn't expect it to
happen so quickly! Ugh. What a pain.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_06.text:
You don't seem bothered by this at all.
Kinda makes a fella wonder if it might
all be part of the plan you mentioned.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_060_CUT_000_07.text:
I wish! But no, totally unrelated.
We need to bring that slime mold under
control, which means we have to fight
the thing again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_00.text:
Okay! The slime mold has been brought
under control, which means we can
finally resume the experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_01.text:
Lemme guess: it involves cajoling an alien
into fighting something so you can get
a bunch of combat data?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_02.text:
Oh, I DO so appreciate how much
of my time you save with your
quick grasp of these situations! You are indeed correct, alien. Also, I can tell
by the sarcasm in that last question that you may
be tiring of this, so let me just say that if you
refuse, I'll have to make Shi Kat do it instead.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_03.text: And you'd be good with that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_04.text:
Oh, I know I wouldn't get the results
I wanted when poor Shi Kat was inevitably
turned into a pulsating pile of goo—but
I bet I'd end up with SOMETHING!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_05.text:
Can't tell if you're joking there,
guy, but I sure wish you'd stop.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_440_070_CUT_000_06.text:
I'm going to take that as a yes.
Now come on, alien! Hop to it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_00.text:
As always, alien, I'm grateful for your
cooperation. Let's start the experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_01.text:
This could lead to another slime mold
infestation. We should enlist the
assistance of Green Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Mr. Kat, did I just hear you volunteer to help
us gather combat data in the alien's stead?
I mean, you ARE a member of Red Division,
so that would be the more preferable outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_03.text:
No, Overseer. I said nothing.
Good luck to you, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_04.text:
Right then! Let me start by explaining the
properties of the slime mold. Basically,
they function as a colony with the ability to
mimic the appearance and behaviors of a host.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_05.text: And you know this how, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I know it because I was the one
who discovered this species! See, the objective of this experiment isn't just
to gather combat data: it's a second attempt at
an experiment I conducted over 3,000 cycles ago—
one thought to have ended in failure!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_07.text:
The goal of that experiment was to acquire
stronger bodies by using parasitic slime
molds that could consume, fuse with,
and gain the powers of their hosts. We theorized that a host possessed of a
powerful will might be able to gain the
slime's powers while still retaining their
own autonomy after being consumed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_08.text:
But the experiment ended in failure,
and the test specimen was sealed away
inside this capsule. He is known as the Beast King—number 440.
We'd worked together as researchers countless
times, and he was the only member of Red Division
I ever considered to be a partner.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_09.text:
You lost your partner in a failed experiment?
Sad as that is, I'm not really seeing what 
that has to do with this experiment?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_10.text:
It has EVERYTHING to do with
this experiment, alien! You're strong—so strong, in fact, that when
the slime mold attempts to take control of you,
you may be powerful enough to resist it and
gain its ability for yourself! Also, if you end up being taken over by the
slime, the Beast King will be free of its control
and come back to life. See? Win-win!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Heck, THAT'S your plan!?
You dragged me into this madhouse because
you think your mummified pal is still alive!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_12.text:
Specimen 440 is a colony of slime mold.
It is not the Beast King.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_13.text:
Silence, insect! What do you know of the
Beast King and slime mold!? Nothing! Oh, but don't worry, alien! Should you
end up being consumed by the slime mold,
you'll just live on in a mummified form!
Pretty neat, right? SO neat!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_14.text:
You must escape at once, alien.
The overseer's behavior has
become dangerously erratic.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_15.text:
I'm not going anywhere, guy, so how about
you just go ahead and open that capsule?
I'm going to destroy the slime mold and
end this moronic experiment for good.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Aaah ha ha ha! I LOVE it, alien!
You have such AMBITION! Now go! Do it! Fight that slime
mold and GIVE IT ALL YA GOT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_17.text:
You are certain, alien?
Then I will do it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_18.text:
Oh, I'll do it, all right...
And there we go. Capsule open!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_19.text:
So you're the Beast King, eh? Guessing that
suit of yours is just full of slime mold,
but I'll have to fight you to find out!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_20.text:
What!? No! Stop, you stupid slime!
You're supposed to attack the alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_22.text:
Specimen 440 is moving to another part
of the base. I speculate it is seeking
more suitable prey.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_000_CUT_000_23.text:
No! No, that's not it at ALL! Don't you see!? It's him! It's the Beast King!
He's looking for his beloved sword!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_01.text:
He has been arrested by decree of
our division council, and will likely
be dismissed from his duties soon.
I have been appointed acting overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_02.text:
Good on you, fella. Er, so what's
the deal with Specimen 440?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_03.text:
We activated the electromagnetic gate
to keep it contained, but do not know
how long it will hold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_04.text:
A portion of the slime mold managed to slip
through the gate before it was activated.
We do not know its present location.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_05.text:
The overseer said that Beast King fella
was going off in search of some sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_002_CUT_000_06.text:
That sword is an artifact. 
Yellow Division is in charge of artifacts.
We should contact them about this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_00.text:
The electronic gate to the monster pens
has been broken. This is likely due to
the slime mold. I believe it is seeking
further prey to consume.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_01.text:
If we do not address this situation,
the monsters will be absorbed by the
Beast King. This will make him very
powerful. We will not be able to fight him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_02.text:
Dang shame the monsters didn't have anything
to do with this, 'cause I don't see a choice
but to head over and take 'em out first.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_03.text:
We should collaborate with Green Division.
They can gas the area. This will put the
monsters into a state of paralysis.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_04.text:
And heck, even an acting overseer should
be able to round up a bunch of critters
that can't move.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_003_CUT_000_05.text:
Yes. This will prevent us from
losing any of our precious samples.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_00.text:
Hey there, Mr. Acting Overseer.
Think you can lower the gate
so I can get to the Beast King?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_004_CUT_000_01.text:
Are you sure? Have you made
all the necessary preparations?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_00.text:
Whoa, crazy. I can't believe the
Beast King's causing trouble again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_01.text: Again? When was the first time?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_02.text:
Yeah, so a while back, somebody from Red
Division stole a cursed sword from us.
We all figured the Beast King was behind it,
but he always refused to admit it. Anyway, one day he up and died,
and we ended up getting it back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_03.text:
I mean, stealing a cursed sword and
keeping it until you die? What a loon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_04.text:
I cannot speak to his motives,
but please allow Red Division to take
custody of that sword once more. A normal artifact container will not suffice.
It must be kept safe from the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh man, alien! You got yourself
mixed up in something weird again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_06.text:
Sure looks that way, fella.
But we could really use your help.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_07.text:
No worries! One cursed sword,
coming right up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_08.text: Actually, hang on, guy. Why do you keep calling it a cursed sword?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_014_CUT_000_09.text:
Oh, because anyone who wields it is
cursed with horrible, never-ending pain!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_00.text:
Well, we recovered the cursed sword, but
I guess only the former overseer knows why
that Beast King fella stole it in the first place.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_02.text:
Seems like a real neat sword.
Think we could use it, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_04.text:
I'm guessing you've seen 
this thing before, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_06.text:
Yellow Division said your old buddy
stole this from 'em. You know why?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_07.text:
We calculated that the power of that sword's
curse prevented the slime mold from taking over
his consciousness—and we were RIGHT!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_08.text:
The Beast King got the power of the slime mold
without being consumed by it, and it was
all thanks to that curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_09.text:
Sadly, the power of the curse ate away
at his mind and made him REALLY violent. Eventually we had to take the sword away,
at which point he was immediately consumed
by the slime mold.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_10.text:
Gonna need you to walk me through this here.
If the Beast King was able to weaken the slime
mold with that sword's curse, why the heck is
it trying to get it back?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_11.text:
Because his strong will is still working
AGAINST the slime mold. He wants to
reclaim the sword—and in doing so,
reclaim his very self! Please, you have to help him!
Give him that sword! I beg you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_12.text:
Yeah, but then your buddy starts running wild
again, which doesn't really strike me as a
better option. I think we need to find a way
to beat the Beast King without using this sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_011_CUT_000_13.text:
Think you better hang onto this
puppy, Mr. Acting Overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_030_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_030_CUT_000_00.text:
You're not getting away
this time, Beast King!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_00.text:
You're not getting away
this time, fella!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_01.text:
Here, Beast King! It's your sword!
Take it and reclaim yourself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_02.text: The heck is THAT guy doing here!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_440
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_012_CUT_000_04.text: I am the Beast King...and I am REBORN!

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_000.text:
Well, that ought to do it
for the slime mold.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_010.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_010.text:
He managed to free himself
of the slime mold at last.

SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_GIMK_MIDO_MON_KATANA_000_020.text:
He sure did—and now it's time
for me to deal with him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_00.text: I'm terribly sorry to bother you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it's you. I received word of your request
from my researchers. We're happy to cooperate,
but take no responsibility for what happens
to your samples as a result of the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_02.text:
Hello again, alien. You seem to have quite
the habit of getting swept up in these
sorts of things, don't you?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_03.text:
Guess that's just the sort of fella I am—
and gotta say, I'm real sick of it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_04.text: Mags, help them prepare the gas.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_05.text: I'll take care of this, alien.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_06.text:
Wait, MAGS is preparing the gas!?
This could go south fast...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_07.text:
Uh, so you sure this'll work there, bud?
I mean, it's not gonna... Oh, I dunno.
Accidentally transform the monsters
into even stronger monsters, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_08.text:
Oh, it certainly might! ...Er, sorry.
Did the overseer not make that clear?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_006_CUT_000_09.text:
Okay, the gas is ready. We can use the tank
on the lower level to disperse it throughout
the area, so let's get moving.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_00.text:
This is Green Division's gas tank.
Er, but it's primarily used for the
creation and cooling of fresh air,
and not for spreading poison.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_01.text:
The gas should have a sedative effect on the
monsters. We don't dare use anything close to
a lethal dose, because that might cause some
very big problems for the rest of the base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_02.text:
A wise decision. Our division is
composed of beings from a variety
of different species, after all.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_03.text:
A mistake here would
be real bad, Mags.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_04.text:
Okay, the gas I derived from the
monophid seeds is in the tank.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_05.text:
All you gotta do now
is flip the switch!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.speaker: GreenTribe_KuMags
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_007_CUT_000_08.text:
It...worked? It WORKED!
Mags, you beautiful genius!
You've done it again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_00.text:
No, Beast King! Don't die!
You can't leave me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_01.text:
Poor guy's been kept alive by slime mold
for 3,000 cycles. I think it's probably
time to let him find some peace.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_02.text:
...No! There's still a chance! I command you to eat me, slime mold!
Take your nourishment from me so
the Beast King might live again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_03.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_03.text:
Holy smokes, guy!
Are you really this stupid!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_04.text:
It's happening! The consciousness of all
the life-forms the slime mold has ever
consumed are flowing into me! Ah! The Beast King is here too!
Oh, my friend, how I've missed you!
If only I'd known this back then!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_05.text:
Kat! I order you to seal us in that capsule
and number it 440A. Should a slime-removal
technique be discovered, you are to...to...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_07.text:
I owe you an apology for all we put
you through, alien. But now I must
ensure capsule 440A is properly sealed.
We will speak later.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_010_CUT_000_08.text:
Gosh, bud. I'm satisfied enough just to
have this whole mess finally be over.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_00.text:
Greetings, alien. I apologize for involving
you in so many irregular situations.
I assure you the overseer and the Beast King
are now safely asleep in Capsule 440A.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_01.text:
But that's not true, 'cause I'm lookin'
at the Red Division's overseer right now! I heard you got officially picked
for the gig there, guy. Congrats!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_02.text:
A being like myself? Leading Red Division?
I cannot believe it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_03.text:
I viewed my predecessor as a reckless being.
A human too chaotic to even process his own data.
But I saw what happened to him in the end,
and realize the Beast King was his true friend. I have no one like that in my life.
I have no friends. I...envy him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_04.text:
Yeah, it's a pretty special thing to live a
life so true to your own feelings like that.
I mean, sure, it almost got me murdered and
fed to a buncha sentient ooze, but still.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_05.text:
We would not have resolved this matter without
you, alien. You have set aside your own goals 
for the sake of Delta Base. We all thank you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_06.text:
Hey, fella, you're making me blush here.
But speaking of goals I set aside,
you mind if I pick 'em up and poke
around Delta Base one last time?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_END_020_CUT_000_07.text:
Take all the time you need.
I wish you luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 056, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_056_999_CUT_000_02.text: So we got the wrong monster, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 098, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_098_999_CUT_000_02.text: So we got the wrong monster, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_00.text:
Uh, this is Specimen 507, alien.
We don't need data for this one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.speaker: RedTribe_ShiKat
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_01.text:
Data for this monster already exists.
There is no need to fight it.
I would advise against it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_MAG_507_999_CUT_000_02.text: So we got the wrong monster, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, hey! Welcome to Yellow Division, 
where we conduct research on the 
civilizations of various worlds. So you're an alien, right? Cool, cool.
The subjects of our research don't
usually come to us—or at least that's
what the division overseer told me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Question for you, guy: Are all the
members of Yellow Division robots?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, if only! I'm Unit B888888, dispatched
from Administration to take over the
overseer's managerial duties. I'm actually the only robot assigned to
Yellow Division. Oh, and everybody here
calls me 'Bean.' Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_030.text:
The Yellow Division overseer has been in
pretty poor health lately, so he's resting
up at the medical facility. But the work doesn't care when a guy's sick,
and it just keeps pilin' up! That's why they
sent me here to help out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Which reminds me, I was supposed to
do something... Oh, right! Promptly
deliver the alien to the overseer.
Guess we better get on that. C'mon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Geez, this fella's a lot
pushier than he looks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_000.text:
Greetings, alien. I am pleased you've come
to visit us, and would like to ask you
many questions about your home world.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_010.text:
Are you the Yellow Division overseer?
I'd heard you weren't feeling so
hot there, bud. You doing okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_020.text:
It appears you hail from a world rich in 
compassion—or so I gather from the fact
you are inquiring about the health of
a complete stranger. But let us start over, as in my
excitement I have quite shamefully
failed to introduce myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I am indeed the Yellow Division overseer,
and my health is indeed rapidly worsening.
In truth, I do not know how much time I have. But perhaps my luck is turning, for here,
in my moment of deepest despair, you have
appeared—and through you, I will gain
all manner of new knowledge!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_040.text:
Dunno how much you're gonna get out of
talking to me there, fella, but I'm happy
to cooperate with your research. Oh, and you asked where I was from
earlier, eh? It's a little place
called Miyako City.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_050.text:
A moment, please. I haven't the strength
to absorb all you have to say. Bean, have you made preparations to
conduct a full research interview?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_060.text:
Yeah, about that. The research scientists
are still down in the lower-level archives,
so I couldn't put a plan together. Those guys! They probably got their noses
caught in some dusty old tome and lost all
track of time! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, I know how that goes. I mean, heck,
sometimes you just can't pull yourself
away from a good book. You want me to head down there and find 'em,
maybe? Give this whole interview thing a
little kick-start?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_003_CUT_000_080.text:
You have my gratitude once more, alien,
and I find my interest in your world
deepening rapidly. Bean, would you be so kind as to
help the alien find the researchers?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_000.text:
I didn't want to worry the overseer,
but the researchers are actually studying
ancient cursed tomes. So, uh, they've
probably been cursed, is my guess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait, THAT'S why they never returned?
We gotta hurry down there and help
the poor folks out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Splendid! I'll activate the lift and we
can go down together. Thanks for all
your help here, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_000.text:
I opened this ancient text purely out
of curiosity and was promptly cursed.
Now I can't move and everything hurts.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_010.text: The fiend that was sealed within the volume wishes to use my body in order to manifest itself in reality. And while that's likely going to be terribly unpleasant in the end, I am appreciating the opportunity to experience a curse firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Whoa! A fiend sealed in a tome is
manifesting itself through a curse?
We have to document this!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_030.text: Er, and save that guy, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_050.text:
Thank you very much. Now if you'll excuse me,
I need to go and document what happened back
at the division office.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Well, huh. Is everybody in
Yellow Division like that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_080.text: So the curse can also be lifted by slaying the associated fiend? I must document this! ...Urgh. Oh dear. While I'm happy the curse is lifted, I'm somehow in even more pain now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_010_CUT_000_100.text: He has no one to blame but himself!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_000.text:
When I started reading this ancient tome,
it unleashed some manner of horrible curse.
Now I can't move. Ugh.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Now THIS is interesting! It appears to be a
DNA conversion script that turns its reader
into a fiend! I've gotta try that sometime...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_030.text: Can't believe folks are getting cursed around here. I mean, it's all robots and computers and junk, y'know?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_040.text: There are curses that function through mechanical engineering, you know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_070.text:
This is some extremely valuable curse
data! Time to download it to the ol'
memory banks...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_080.text:
It appears that by slaying the monster,
the DNA conversion reverses itself.
What an advanced curse!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_020_CUT_000_100.text:
The conversion script has disappeared!
Fight it again, please!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_000.text:
When we read the tome, our backs froze up
and we couldn't move. I surmise that we
have all been cursed.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Guys, come on! You were sent here in a group
of three specifically so you could watch each
other and make sure no one looked at, read,
or opened anything!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Sorry, but...you know. Researchers?
Our curiosity got the better of us.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Yep. The most dangerous topics
are always the most seductive.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Dear me. When curiosity overcomes
reason, things go terribly wrong.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Hope you folks learned to
take curses more seriously.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Honestly, I didn't expect the curses
to take effect so quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_080.text:
We never should have
read those books.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_030_CUT_000_090.text:
Consider yourself lucky that slaying
those fiends lifted the curses!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Now that all of our researchers are safe,
it's time for me to head back and prepare
your qualitative research interview.
Thanks for your patience, friend!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, right. The interview thing.
Sorta forgot all about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Who the heck knew I'd run into cursed tomes
in a sci-fi place like this? Guess I really
do got an affinity for the occult...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_000.text:
Will you attempt to dispel
the curse for us, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_010.speaker: HERO
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_090_CUT_010_010.text: Sure, I'll give it a shot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_000.text:
We about ready for this
interview deal, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, about that. When I reported the cursed
tomes incident to the overseer, he ordered me
to continue researching them, seeing as I'm
immune to curses and all. Anyway, looks like your interview is
gonna have to wait.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_020.text:
Uh, you sure you're immune there, fella?
I mean, I know you're a robot and all,
but does that really mean anything?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, why would you even say that!?
Are you TRYING to scare me here?
Of course I'm immune! ...Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_040.text: Just looking to keep you on your toes. But heck, I'm sure that even if you are cursed, you're gonna be fine.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_050.text:
Ugh. UGH. Now I'm just a nervous wreck about
this whole thing. But I can't say 'no' to an
overseer on his deathbed, sooo...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_01_100_CUT_000_060.text:
If anything goes wrong, guy,
I'll be there for you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_000.text: Huh? Got something in my pocket.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_010.text:
Looks like a page torn out of a book.
Where'd this come from?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_099_CUT_000_020.text:
Hmm... Something about this whole
deal feels real important.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Heavens, man! That looks like a page
from the mysterious tome known as
the Necronomicon!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I sorta just found this.
Is it important?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Yes, that's a Necronomicon page, all right.
This is highly auspicious: that book is said
to tear out its own pages and grant good
fortune to whoever returns them.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Might I have that page?
I'm DYING to test that theory!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_050.text:
If there's good fortune at stake here,
guy, I'll just bring it back myself.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Tsk! Should have just kept my mouth shut.
But if the Necronomicon flays your flesh
from your bones, don't come crying to me!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_000.text: Should I return the page to the book?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_010_CUT_000_010.text: Whole thing looks like a real mess.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Tsk! I was promised 'good fortune,'
but all I got was a dang battle.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_000.text:
Yeah, no. I got a real bad
feeling about all this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_04_021_CUT_000_010.text: I'll just toss the dang page.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_000.text: This some sort of research center?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure is! How was an alien like
yourself able to discern that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Eh, it's kinda got the same vibe as
the university I go to back home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_030.text:
University...? Ah! An educational institution
established for the purposes of both advanced
instruction and cutting-edge research! It is an impressive system that effectively
brings elite research directly to top-tier
students... Also ultimate frisbee?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Guessing you got some sort of
search engine in there, eh, bud?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Close! I am Advanced Office-work Model B888888,
dispatched by the Administrative Division to
handle the organizational duties of Yellow
Division's current overseer. Oh, and everybody here calls me 'Bean.'
Hilarious, right!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_060.text:
So here's the thing, alien: I've been ordered
to bring you to the overseer the moment you
arrive, but...I don't really want to.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Can a robot like you just
ignore orders like that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Not really, no! And since I have to prioritize
orders without regard for my own feelings,
I suppose we're off to see the overseer. But before we go, let me fill you
in on a little something first:

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Due to a recent illness, the overseer
has become excessively paranoid. And between you and me, I bet he's
going to think you've come here to
reclaim the cultural artifacts taken
from your world by Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_100.text:
I don't give a toot about artifacts, guy.
I just came here for spirits.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Really? That's great! But I am also hurt to hear
you don't 'give a toot' about cultural artifacts.
Please do be more careful about how you frame
such things in the overseer's presence, 'kay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_000.text:
There you are, alien!
From which world do you hail?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_010.text: I'm from a place called Miyako City.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_020.text: Miyako City...? Ah! Then you've come to reclaim the sword. It is a fabled treasure recovered from the depths of the sea—an artifact your people lacked the technology to raise. Why, without Yellow Division, you'd have no idea it even existed!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_030.text:
I agree with you there, fella. Precious swords
choose their wielders, not the other way around,
which is why the sword's here and not there.
I got no issue with that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_040.text:
I am pleased you understand. But to come
all the way from Miyako City and leave
without beholding the sword would be a
fate far too cruel for words!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_003_CUT_000_050.text:
Bean, you will permit this alien to
view the sword—under the strictest
of supervision, of course.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_000.text:
Your response sure made the overseer happy,
alien—I haven't seen him look so satisfied
in quite a long time. In fact, he's been nothing but ill-tempered
lately, much to the sorrow of everyone in
Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_010.text:
Anyway, I need to make a follow-up report
to the overseer, so please go view the
sword in question regardless of your
actual level of interest in the matter.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_020.text:
Hey, I'm happy to take a peek at it;
cultural artifacts may not float my boat
in general, but I sure do love swords. Plus, if this one was lost at sea,
I already got an idea what it might be.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_004_CUT_000_030.text:
So you weren't merely patronizing him!?
Oh! In that case, let's go view the sword.
I'll activate the lift to the lower level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_000.text:
What the heck? The sword's in pieces!
Look, guy. Just 'cause you're researching
something doesn't give you the right to
go breaking the thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I assure you that this is not our doing;
the sword was originally created to separate
in this fashion, and for now it must remain
in this disassembled state.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_020.text:
He's right! The moment you appeared here,
alien, this sword started to vibrate.
These vibrations triggered a dimensional
resonance that caused energy forms to appear.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_030.text:
By which Bean means monsters. Yet by separating
the sword's pieces, we can lessen its resonance
and weaken the energy forms it spawns—making
the monsters smaller, in other words. And that's why we're keeping the thing in
pieces while we investigate the source.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Gosh, I guess that Yellow Division overseer
was right, maybe? Sounds like I really do
have some sort of connection to this sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_050.text:
When disassembled, a pattern resembling words
appears on the surface of the blade. We believe
this has some sort of supernatural or ceremonial
significance, but that's still being investigated.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_060.text:
...Oh dear. It seems an energy form has
found us. Bean, could you do something?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Fella, that fiend may hold a clue to
the origin of this sword—so I say we
fight it and see what happens!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_000.text:
So what'd this sword used to look like,
anyway? It's kinda hard to imagine it
just by looking at a buncha pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_010.text: Sadly, that's not exactly an easy thing to describe. Based solely on its appearance, one would hardly surmise it was a weapon at all. However, one could definitely sense a sort of power contained within it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_020.text:
But it didn't have rust
or nicks or anything?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_030.text: Oh, nothing of the sort! See, the technology here in Delta Base let us restore it to a flawless state. Er, although we did lose possession of it for a bit after that...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_040.text:
But we haven't performed any sort of in-depth
study since it was returned to us. Honestly,
the only reason we're even looking at the
thing now is because you showed up.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_050.text:
Gosh, I hate to think this is all
my fault, but I sure would like
to know what happened here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_060.text:
Hey, I getcha! Although, again,
it's entirely possible this is
unrelated to your being here.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_020_CUT_000_070.text:
Say, uh, Bean? I think we're about to
have another energy form on our hands.
Can you take care of it, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Made any progress deciphering
the inscription there, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_010.text:
It clearly indicates that something will happen
when the sword is reassembled, but the risk of
doing so is too great until we find a way to
stop the vibration.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_020.text: Got any ideas on that front?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_030.text:
We're attempting to negate the vibration by
reversing the characters of the inscription,
but we haven't been able to focus on the task
with all the energy forms running about.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_040.text:
Oh, no worries!
We can handle that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_030_CUT_000_050.text: I'm not sure I've even seen you handle much of anything, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_000.text:
It appears that if we create a replica with
the inscription reversed, it will conversely
absorb the vibrations—which will let us safely
continue our research on the upper level.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowE
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_016_CUT_000_010.text:
I will let you handle
the rest, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_000.text:
When the energy forms disappear, their energy
flows back into the sword—which means the
sword itself may be a kind of generator. We need to study it further once
we have the other pieces.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowD
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_026_CUT_000_010.text:
Can you take care of that
for us, please?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_000.text:
So this sword isn't actually a weapon.
While it may have been used as one,
that was never its intended function. But as to what its proper function
actually is, we don't yet know.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_FellowC
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_010.text:
Regardless, this sounds like a fruitful
avenue of study, don't you think?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_030.text:
These pieces should allow us to reassemble
the sword. We can then show it to the alien
in accordance with the overseer's orders.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_060.text:
I appreciate your patience, alien!
Don't worry, we'll have this thing
patched back together in no time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_036_CUT_000_070.text:
Aw, don't be like that! Just take a
look once it's put back together.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_000.text:
We finished restoring the sword, alien!
Come take a look!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, I'm sure you of all people remember
what it's supposed to look like, right? That's why I'm taking you to the artifact-
restoration workshop so you can experience
the restoration duties of a Yellow Division
member firsthand!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_050.text:
Splendid work! And with this, I can officially
say that I've followed the overseer's order
to show you the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_060.text:
