Oh, and there's MORE good news! The repair of
the sword seems to have made the overseer feel
better; he intends to return to work and
study the sword's true purpose personally!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_070.text:
That's an incredible recovery
right there. Glad to hear it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_080.text:
Hey, so you also seem to have something of an
interest in the sword's true nature, right?
If so, you should join us in our research!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_090.text: Sure, if I feel up to it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_110.text:
There's a piece of the sword left over?
But it all fit back together perfectly!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_120.text:
Guess I'll keep this as
a little souvenir.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_05_090_CUT_000_130.text:
Ack! No! I don't know if I'll be able
to put it back together again!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey there, fella. So what
goes on around here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_010.text:
...Huh. Guess it couldn't hear me.
HEY THERE, FELLA!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, crud. Is this robot broken?
Or heck, maybe it never worked
in the first place?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Fully functional, thank you! However, I have been ordered to ignore the
alien—which is you—and would appreciate you
not interfering with that, especially since
you are FAR more assertive than I expected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_050.text: Hold on just a second there. Someone ordered you to ignore me?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Yep! The Yellow Division overseer ordered the
entire division not to engage with the alien—
and as his administrative surrogate, I had
no choice but to follow said order. Oh, and please don't ask me why he issued that
order, because I have ZERO idea. Frankly, I feel
like chatting with you is a wonderful opportunity
for cultural exchange!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Fella, if somebody's gonna ignore me,
I wanna know why. How about you take
me to see this overseer of yours, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_080.text: Oh, I'm afraid the overseer has been in poor health for quite some time and is currently being treated in the medical facility. And while visitors aren't expressly forbidden, it won't be easy to get in.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Medical facility, eh? Thanks.
I'll head there now.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Ack! I didn't expect he'd pursue
him right into the hospital!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_110.text:
Hey there, bud. I hear the Yellow
Division overseer's in here?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_120.text:
The Yellow Division overseer is I, alien!
Now why have you come!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_130.text:
You ordered your people to ignore
me and I wanna know why. I mean, I get that's your prerogative and all,
but I like to think I'm a pretty swell guy,
so I'm gonna be tossin' and turnin' all night
if I don't learn the reason.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_140.text:
Your visit here has put the entirety of 
Delta Base in danger, alien—which is why
I want you to complete your objective and
leave as quickly as possible. And as far as Yellow Division saw it,
ignoring you seemed like the best way
to achieve that outcome.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Hey, I'm just here to grab a spirit,
and no one would be happier than me
if I could just wrap that up and get
out of your hair already. Don't suppose you'd lend me that helper
robot of yours, maybe? He'd probably
make the search go a lot quicker.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_160.text:
You hear that, fella?
He said you could help me out. Really looking forward to working with
you on this. So, uh, what's your name?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_170.text:
I am B888888, but the members of Yellow
Division refer to me as 'Bean.'
Also, I never imagined you'd be so pushy
about all of this! Sheesh!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_180.text:
I'm looking for a spirit, Bean.
Got any ideas where I can find one?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Well, I guess there are spirit-like beings on
the base's lower level, though I have no idea 
if they're the kind you're looking for or not. Anyhoo, let's take the Yellow Division
lift down there and I'll show you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Behold the spriggans!
Er, these are spirits, right? Also, as beings that eat gems, they're often
found nibbling on Yellow Division's precious-
minerals collection, which is a real bother.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_010.text:
I dunno, guy. I'm gonna need to fight
these critters to learn if they're
actually spirits or not.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_010_CUT_000_020.text: Well, don't let me stop you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_000.text:
Those aren't spriggans.
Er, and I don't think
they're spirits, either.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_011_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, let's just call it a hunch!
You'd be better off ignoring 'em.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Well? Were any of those the
spirits you were looking for?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh? That's a drag. But you've still done
us a great service by getting rid of those
awful spriggans! Now let's gather up the
gem fragments they dropped.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_020_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, don't look so glum.
There'll be other chances!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, so that spriggan or whatever?
Not a spirit.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey, don't be so hasty! The natures of
spriggans differ on an individual basis.
I mean, that one right over there could
be a spirit, you know!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh yeah? Guess I'd better
fight it and find out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_030_CUT_000_030.text:
That's right! You'll never know
for sure until you do!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Well? Were any of those the
spirits you were looking for?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, no. In fact, they didn't seem any
different from the first ones we fought.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, how about that... But don't lose hope,
because there are still plenty more around!
Oh, but let's make sure to gather up these
gem fragments before we go find 'em, okay?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_000.text:
Yeah, no. That's another spriggan.
Definitely not what I'm looking for.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_010.text: Unless...it's a spirit camouflaging itself as a spriggan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_020.text:
What? No. That thing's chowing
down on some gem right now.
It's absolutely a spriggan.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_030.text:
IS it though? I mean, you'll never know
for sure unless you fight it, right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Fella, I'm startin' to think you're
just using me to take care of your
little spriggan problem. I mean, you're probably tired of 'em
snacking on your jewels and minerals
and whatever, eh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_050.text:
WHAAAAAT!? I'm shocked! Shocked, I tell you!
Why, that couldn't be further from the truth!
All I'm doing here, alien, is trying to help
YOU find some spirits! Also, that isn't just a 'gem' that thing
is eating—it's an invaluable specimen
known as the philosopher's stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_060.text:
Oh hey, I've heard of that before.
It's an important deal for folks
who wanna use magic, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_070.text:
If you've heard of it, you'll clearly
understand why that particular stone
would be of intense interest to a
spirit, right? Right?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_080.text:
Cripes, guy! Why didn't you lead with that?
I sorta felt like I was being deceived there,
and I didn't much care for it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_090.text:
Deceived? Why, I am offended, sir!
I would never DREAM of... Okay, fine. I deceived you. I had no idea if
there were spirits down here or not, but I
wanted to put your alien strength to use.
Sorry about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_100.text: Eh, it's all right. That fella munching on the philosopher's stone is pretty close to a spirit. Heck, technically speaking, it probably is a spirit. I mean, it's not really the kind I'm looking for, but I can't blame you for not knowing that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_110.text:
I'm truly moved by your forgiveness,
alien, and refuse to believe your
presence here could possibly pose
any threat to Delta Base!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_050_CUT_000_120.text:
Thanks for believing in me, guy.
Now how about I drive away those
spriggans and we get back to looking
for the right kind of spirit together?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_000.text:
Oh, goodie! Thanks to you, we recovered
the pieces of some very precious stones!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_010.text:
And with those spirit-like spriggans out of
the way, we've made it easier to find the
spirit I'm actually looking for—or at least
I'll call that the upshot.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_020.text:
But geez, that philosopher's stone of yours
is all in pieces now. Is that gonna be a
problem for you, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_050.text:
If you put all the pieces in the
correct place, the stone returns
to how it used to be! Yes, the philosopher's stone has some real magic,
all right. Er, but they don't snap together
by themselves, so you have to do it manually.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_060.text:
That sounds like fun, actually.
Give it here a sec.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_070.text:
Whoa! I never imagined an alien like you would
possess such capabilities! Why, this could lead
to significant advances in our understanding of
the philosopher's stone, so thanks for that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_080.text:
Eh, no good.
This is too tough for me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_090.text:
If it's so difficult that even a Bean
Model-8 like myself struggles to put
it back together, it's no surprise
that you couldn't do it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_100.text:
I'll bring the philosopher's stone back,
and then we can get to work on
your spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_120.text: How can there be a piece left over?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_130.text:
Seems like a part of the philosopher's
stone. Well, if Bean doesn't need it,
I'll give it a good home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_060_CUT_000_140.text:
I'll bring the pieces of the philosopher's stone
back, and then we can get to work on your
little spirit thing.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_000.text:
Good news, alien! I reported our latest
adventures to the overseer and handed
over the philosopher's stone you fixed. I thought for sure he'd be mad at me,
but he actually praised me instead! It seems
his whole 'ignore the alien' order has been
completely forgotten.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_010.text:
That's quite the change in attitude.
This philosopher's stone must be real
important to you folks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_020.text:
Regardless, it is no longer necessary
for you to quickly conclude your
business and leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, but there was a piece of bad news at the
end: the overseer ordered me to start prepping
the next experiment, so our spirit search will
have to wait until that's finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_06_120_CUT_000_040.text:
Eh, don't sweat it. I'll just wander
around Delta Base here for a bit.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_000.text:
I bring good tidings, alien! The overseer's
health has improved, and he'll officially
be resuming his duties today!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Sure you're feeling up to that, fella?
You don't wanna push yourself too hard.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_020.text:
While I admit I'm pushing myself somewhat,
the mental anguish from staying cooped up
in that medical facility would be far worse
for me in the long run. Now then, Bean. Isn't there an
additional piece of news to share?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Indeed there is! We've had a breakthrough
in our research into the cursed tomes,
and now know it's connected to our
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of
both locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Buddy, I'm not an expert at this sort
of thing, and your explanation hasn't
really helped. What does any of this
have to do with the cursed tomes?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Oh, right! See, when I read through the
ancient tomes to verify their contents,
I wasn't cursed in the same way the
fleshy researchers were. Instead, the transformative functions of
the tome activated my internal mechanisms!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Not sure what that means, exactly?
Heck, you look pretty much the same
as you always have to me.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Whaaat? You can't even tell that
my processing speed has tripled!? No, that's a joke. I was already
fully activated, so there was no
visible effect.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_100.text: But it did give us the idea of using the tome's curse on the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! And upon further investigation, we found numerous commonalities that suggest the specimen and cursed tomes are connected.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_110.text:
In summation, we believe the curse
in the ancient tomes is, in fact,
an activation command for the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Sounds like a pretty big deal right there.
And heck, I know how passionate you
Yellow Division folks are about your
research, so good on you there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Oh, but our research doesn't end with
this revelation, alien! We intend to
use the curse to attempt to activate
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_150.text:
Only one way to find out! Because whether it
works or not, the important thing is that
we try. Isn't that right, Overseer?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Exactly so, Bean. I appreciate how you
have a wonderful way of saying things
I often struggle to express. Now then, alien. If you are ready,
I would very much like you to witness
our grand experiment.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_000_CUT_000_190.text:
All necessary preparations
have been made.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_000.text: Alien! We must speak of the sword.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Hey there, Mr. Overseer.
How you feeling?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_020.text:
My physical condition is irrelevant!
All that matters is that the sword is
innately connected to the Orichalcum
Skeletal Specimen! Now tell me everything you know about
the specimen, and do not lie!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Fella, I don't have the foggiest idea
what you're talking about there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is a
skeleton created from a rare metal
called orichalcum.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_050.text:
It contains means of both locomotion and
communication, and we believe it to be an
anatomical model of an exoskeletal life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't play dumb with me, alien!
I know you really came here to recover
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! But as I'm about to prove, we have already
solved its mystery—and we have no intention
of returning it to you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Sure guy, whatever.
You have fun with that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_090.text:
It's okay, Bean. This isn't your fault.
I don't want anything to do with
Yellow Division anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_100.text:
No! Please don't say that!
Just come observe this one experiment!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_110.text:
So your overseer can throw more crazy
accusations my way? No thanks, bud.
I'm done being a punching bag.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_120.text:
But if something goes wrong with the experiment,
Yellow Division will need help dealing with it—
and the overseer is too proud to seek aid from
the Administrative or any other division!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_130.text:
But you're from the Administrative
Division, and you're helping him.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_140.text:
Sure, but I'm sort of a special case because
I was involved with reassembling the sword.
Please help me here! I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_170.text: I appreciate you even considering it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_010_CUT_000_180.text:
Please help me out here, alien!
I'm begging you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_000.text:
A moment, alien! I heard what happened with
the philosopher's stone. Your hard work was very
much appreciated, and I apologize for suggesting
you might bring misfortune to Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Aw, you don't need to apologize for that.
Also, I guess that rock must've been
a real deal for you guys, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_020.text:
As I gazed upon the restored stone,
I suddenly recalled the Orichalcum 
Skeletal Specimen whose study we had
neglected for so many years. I was struck with an intuitive sense 
that this was the key to its mystery!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is an
anatomical model made of a rare metal
called orichalcum. Please note that while we believe the
skeleton to be man-made, it is not a
human skeleton, and therefore does not
resemble either you or the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_050.text:
The skeleton contains means of both
locomotion and communication. As such, it is likely modeled after an
exoskeletal life-form, with an appearance
indicative of the beings that inhabit
the world on which it was created.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_060.text:
I believe we can use the power of the
philosopher's stone to set the skeletal
model in motion, giving us valuable clues
into the civilization that created it. Oh, but I could not be more
excited about the prospect!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_07_020_CUT_000_070.text:
The experiment's all ready to go, alien,
so we're hoping you might do us the
honor of observing it with us?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So this is your skeletal specimen?
Looks pretty mechanical to me,
but maybe I'm wrong about that.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_010.text:
It sure does, doesn't it!? But that strong
mechanical appearance is an aspect our
cultural researchers had to shed their
preconceived assumptions about. See, because whoever made the specimen
clearly felt it was skeletal in nature,
not mechanical.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Now let us begin the activation of
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! I will read from the cursed tome.
That way, should anything go wrong,
the sacrifice will be mine alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_030.text:
For when I said I had recovered, that was
a lie. One way or the other, this will be
my final duty for Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_060.text:
The curse... I can feel it...
Agh! Such...pain! But I must continue! Before long, 
the transformation...should...begin...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Holy cripes, we got a man down!
Looks like he couldn't handle it.
Time to end this, Bean!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_100.text: Oh wow! That was the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Ah, of course! I am now inside
the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen! As I suspected, the curse was never a curse
at all, but merely a way for the people of
that world to transfer themselves into a
new exoskeleton.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_130.text:
Nice job, Overseer. The experiment was a
success! Now please share your observations
with us so we can take notes.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_140.text:
I am gradually beginning to understand how
this skeleton works. At the brink of death,
I have been freed from my withered, useless
body and awakened inside a new one.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_150.text:
You're blowing my mind here, Overseer!
I mean, with that new skeleton, you might
be able to live on forever!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_160.text:
Not sure that's something we
should be celebrating, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Hmm? Who are you? What are
all of you doing in...?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Overseer? What's happening?
Who are you talking to?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_190.text:
No... No! I'm not alone in this body!
There are hundreds—no, thousands
of others...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_210.text:
Uh-oh. The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is attempting to access Delta Base's
information networks.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Oh, heck! The overseer didn't take over
the body—the body took HIM over!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_230.text:
Correct... Cannot defy the majority...
Cut us off... Protect...Delta...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_240.text:
Bean, we gotta do something!
Bean!? C'mon, guy!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_250.text:
I am acting as fast as my
processors allow, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_260.text:
The specimen intends to use the overseer's
knowledge to take over Delta Base. You must
physically cut Yellow Division off from the
network in order to protect it. I will attempt to interfere with the
specimen's communications systems
in order to buy you time.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_000_CUT_000_270.text:
I'll work as fast as I can,
alien, but please hurry!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_000.text:
For so many years, the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen has stood as a great mystery even
within Yellow Division's varied collection. But now, its connection to the reassembled
sword is clear: we can expect that the
interdimensional energy pulses released by
the blade will activate its skeletal frame.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Now, let us begin the experiment.
Bean, do not forget to document
everything. And...begin resonating!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_020.text:
Yes, it is exactly as predicted...
As the sword and I resonate together,
so too does the skeletal frame. This sword is the key that bonds
the skeleton to its wielder.
Increase the resonance!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_040.text:
The overseer's collapsed! Kill the experiment,
Bean—this is way too much for a fella in his
condition to take.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_060.text:
Uh-oh. That voice is coming from the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen, but it
sounds like the overseer!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_070.text:
Correct, Bean. I am now within the specimen.
Or perhaps it would be more accurate to say
that the specimen is now I? Behold, alien! I have achieved the full
integration with the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen which you could not!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_080.text:
How many times do I gotta tell you I don't
give a damn about your weird skeleton?
But fine. You're one with it or whatever.
Whatcha gonna do now?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_090.text:
I'm going to infiltrate the core systems
of Delta Base and take control of all of its
functions! Such a feat will be a simple task
inside my new body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_100.text:
Once I am in full command of Delta Base,
I will begin my advance into all the other
worlds, thereby bringing their civilizations
under my control as well!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_110.text:
Well, the overseer's lost his marbles—
I mean, if he ever had any to begin with.
So what do we do now, Bean?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_130.text:
Sorry! I'm currently in the process of
diverting all the skeleton's connection
requests through me in hopes of slowing
his access to Delta Base's systems!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_010_CUT_000_140.text:
And I guess I better do what I can
to stop him in the meantime, eh?
Good luck there, guy.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_000.text:
Boy howdy, you weren't kidding—this specimen
doesn't look like a person at all. Heck, it's more
like some kind of exoskeletal creature from the
arthropod family.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, I'd love to know what sort of civilization
these people created—and I bet reactivating this
skeleton will tell us all about it! The overseer
is a genius for thinking up this plan!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_020.text:
Thank you, Bean. And now that I have the
philosopher's stone, let us begin our activation
of the Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_030.text:
It was a wise choice to build the frame
out of orichalcum. It is extremely durable,
yet adaptable enough to meet the needs
of multiple civilizations. However...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_050.text: Guy's talking like he was the one who built that skeleton deal.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_060.text:
We didn't have the energy source to power
the orichalcum frame, and so were only
able to operate it briefly. Now that we have the philosopher's stone,
however, its power should ensure a
sufficient duration of operability.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_080.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now online.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_090.text: The overseer's been pulled into it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_100.text:
Analyzing all information... Overseer...
Yellow Division... Delta Base...
Organizational structure... Analysis complete. Placing Delta Base
under our authority.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_110.text:
Uh-oh! The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen is
attempting to access Delta Base's information
network! Attempting to cut off accyrk•#

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_020_CUT_000_120.text:
Infiltrat*t5 Delta $9wBase netwo4u@%*8$ym.
Please physically sever Yellow Divisio*5n
from netw0r# to protect Delta Ba3&^j.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_000.text:
A control panel, eh? Guess I can just
cut the power to this, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_010.text:
Okay, still two connections to sever.
Geez, Delta Base feels like a mighty
big place all of a sudden...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_020.text:
Only one more connection to sever.
Hope I can make it in time!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_030.text:
Okay, that should keep Mr. Skeleton
from taking control of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_050_CUT_000_040.text:
Sure hope Bean's okay.
I better hurry back.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_000.text:
You okay, Bean!? Yellow Division should
be cut off from the rest of the base now!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_010.text:
Confirming isolationlationlationlation...
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen sevevevevered...
...Hmm? My processessessing speed appears to
be dropping. Initiating reboooooot...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_020.text:
Bean!? What do I do here, bud!?
...Cripes. Guess he's rebooting.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_080_CUT_000_030.text:
Well, I can't just leave that standing
there, so I better try and stop it!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_010.text:
&j823 network #2uf&& secured.
Plea$3se stop ^4r6 Orich*1hym
Sk3#4tal Specim*n.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_082_CUT_000_020.text:
Fella, I got no idea how to
even begin doing that!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_000.text:
If we lifted the curse, the transformation
should reverse and return the overseer
to his former body.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_010.text:
Alas, that does not appear to be the case.
That curse truly was a curse—or perhaps it
was a punishment. This body is a prison. I will be
captive here forever, with no hope
of escape or death.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_020.text:
But you haven't done anything to deserve
spending eternity in skeleton heck!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_030.text:
Thank you for saying so, alien. However,
I am now able to visualize the culture that
felt it necessary to create such a prison. Once I am able to communicate with the others 
trapped in here, I look forward to continuing
my research. Therefore, I view this not as a
punishment, but as an opportunity.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_040.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen will soon
shut down and enter an eternal slumber.
Thank you, alien. Farewell, Bean.
Glory to Yellow Division.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_050.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
is now offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_060.text:
Don't blame yourself for this, alien:
the die was cast the moment the overseer
transferred himself into the skeleton. In fact, you were right to put
a stop to it when you did!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_030_CUT_000_070.text:
Never thought you'd be the one cheering me up,
fella. But believe you me, I don't think I'll
ever forget Delta Base OR the overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_000.text:
All right, Overseer! Your whole stupid dream
of universal domination or whatever the heck
has been foiled, so how about you crawl back
into your own body now!?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_010.text:
Vile alien! I will never permit the
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen to fall
into your treacherous hands!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_020.text:
No way! Never thought the guy
would actually self-destruct.
He must've really hated me, huh?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_030.text:
Don't blame yourself, alien.
That sort of paranoia has always been
part of the overseer's general nature. Between his sickness and his advanced age,
I'm guessing he just couldn't hold it
back anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_040.text:
Plus, who knows what effect the
sword and skeleton had on him?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_050.text:
You think they might have
knocked a screw loose, maybe?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_060.text:
I think it's a strong possibility, sure.
But I'd like to reassemble both artifacts
to investigate them further.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_070.text:
Sounds like a heck of a
weekend project there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_031_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's a trivial matter for the researchers
of Yellow Division. In fact, that's just the
sort of thing they live for!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_000.text:
Boy, things sure felt wrong from the
moment the overseer's attitude changed. ...Overseer? Can you still
hear me there, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_010.text:
I was ensnared by the power
of the philosopher's stone and
set these events in motion. To everyone in Yellow Division, I am
deeply sorry. My behavior has been a
disgrace to all of Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_020.text:
And yet, alien, this all came to pass because
of your presence. Had you not come here,
I never would have touched the stone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_030.text: Forgive me for saying so, Overseer, but this all would have happened eventually even without the alien! In fact, his being here saved us all from a much greater disaster.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_040.text:
Heed me, all members of Yellow Division!
You are to have nothing to do with the alien!
That is my final order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.speaker: Orichalcum_Body
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_050.text:
The philosopher's stone is running out
of energy... Ah, but this is a surprise...
I expected it to last longer...

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_060.text:
The Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen
has gone offline.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_070.text:
And sorry, alien, but until a new overseer
is chosen, the orders of the former one
have to remain in effect—which means I
won't be able to help you anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_032_CUT_000_080.text: That's all right, guy. But boy, what a stubborn so-and-so that overseer turned out to be, eh? Still, I get why he said what he did—I mean, maybe I really was the cause of all this. Guess I oughta find my spirit and leave Delta Base as soon as I can.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_000.text:
Congratulations, alien! I received word
from Administrator Gold that you acquired
your spirit power! Hurray for you!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_010.text:
Thanks, Bean. But I don't know—for some
reason, I don't feel too happy about it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_020.text:
Don't worry about the overseer!
One day, Yellow Division will find a way
to safely reactivate the Orichalcum Skeletal
Specimen and reunite with our overseer. And when that happens, all the mysteries
of the skeleton will be solved.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_030.text:
Heh. You Yellow Division folks are a
real impressive bunch, you know that?
Well, when that time comes,
give the overseer my regards.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_040.text:
I certainly will! But for now,
I take it it's time for you to
continue your own journey?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_040_CUT_000_050.text:
It sure is, fella.
Be well, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh! Heya, alien! I was so focused on my
repair work that I didn't notice you.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_030.text:
Already cleaning up the mess, eh?
You sure do work fast.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_040.text:
I've only achieved 0.01% of the desired result.
Sadly, I cannot even begin to calculate when
my duties might be finished.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_050.text:
But I know you'll get there
in the end, guy. Good luck.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_060.text:
Thanks, alien. Also, I see you managed to acquire a spirit!
Nice job! But I also suppose this leaves you
with no further reason to remain in Delta Base,
which means this is goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_070.text:
Yep. I just swung by to say farewell.
Thanks for everything, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_080.text:
Oh, it's we in Delta Base who should be
grateful to you! Should you visit us again,
your registration will be complete, and you
will no longer be referred to as 'alien.'

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_041_CUT_000_090.text:
That right? Huh. Guess I've kinda
grown used to my new nickname. Also, I can't promise there'll be
a next time, but if there is,
it'll be good to see you again.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_000.text: What are you doing here, alien?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_010.text:
Oh, just wanted to say goodbye
before I left Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_020.text:
Is that so? How unexpected.
Well, goodbye.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_030.text:
Aw, come on, guy! Why so cold?
Also, what happened to the whole
Orichalcum Skeletal Specimen deal?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_050.text:
What? Why? I thought Yellow Division
was determined to get to the bottom
of whatever it was.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_060.text:
There is no purpose in keeping unneeded
things lying about. It is only logical
that they be disposed of.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_070.text:
Huh. Well, there were other things I wanted
to talk to you about, but I guess you're not
in the mood. Later, Bean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_080.text:
...Did the alien see through
my clever facade?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.speaker: YellowTribe_Bean
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CLT_08_042_CUT_000_090.text:
Just to be safe, I'll do some meddling when
he enters the connectivity gate to ensure
he becomes lost in the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This must be that cell where the
overseer said an alien's being held.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Cripes is there even anybody in there?
It's real hard to tell from here,
but I don't sense any fiends, at least.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Criminy, who's that out there now?
If you're delivering nutrient-paste tubes,
a fella already came by today, so I'd
appreciate you leavin' me the heck alone.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Hold on a minute there, fella!
Are you from Miyako City?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_060.text:
...Miyako City? Never heard of it. Ha!
Just my luck to get a real weirdo for my
first human visitor in who knows how long!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_070.text:
I heard from Green Division's overseer that
there was an offworld alien being held here.
Also, don't mean to imply nothing, but are
you sure that's not a Miyako accent, guy?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_080.text:
I don't know 'Miyako City,' but Miyako...
Boy howdy, now THAT name takes me back. So how do you know how folks from Miyako talk,
fella? You from Yellow Division or something?
Or...holy heck! Maybe you're actually an
alien FROM Miyako!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Criminy, did you just say you're a Mido?
Oh, I'm sorry, sir! I sure didn't expect
to be entertaining a highborn visitor! Still, lineage don't mean two toots here in
the faraway land of Delta Base, so please
excuse me if I fumble my manners, sir.
I sure don't mean nothing by it.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_110.text:
I couldn't care less about manners there,
fella. I just wanna know how you ended up
here on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_120.text:
Well, it ain't right for folks to be turning
their swords on a fella just because he's a
foreigner. So when I went and saved that guy,
he told me he hails from Delta Base. Then he brought me back with him to see it—
to thank me, he said. I thought he was taking
me to a foreign country, but I ended up in a
whole foreign world instead!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_130.text:
I only planned to spend a few days here,
but all the researching and experimenting
seemed like a heck of a lot of fun.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_140.text:
By the time I was ready to leave, it turned
out that centuries had passed back home
and I didn't know a soul there anymore.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_160.text:
I dunno if I'd spent that long on the base
or if the flow of time's just different here.
Or maybe those dang pods are the problem?
Yeah, never shoulda slept in those suckers.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_170.text:
That's something you should watch
out for yourself, Mr. Mido.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Anyway, in the end I locked myself up in here
so I could be alone with my thoughts—but I'm 
still grateful as all heck that you took the
time to visit me, Mr. Mido, sir. Oh, I'd be delighted
if you'd accept this.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_190.text:
And now, I will be on my way.
A pleasure meeting you, sir.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_210.text:
I think I would like to lay
eyes on Miyako once more.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_220.text:
But you don't know folks there anymore,
right? How you even gonna survive?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Vagrant
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_000_CUT_000_230.text:
I don't know. Maybe I won't. I can think of
far worse things than dying on the streets
of my beloved Miyako. When you're my age,
Mr. Mido, you will understand this as well.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_001_CUT_000_000.text:
That fella left this box behind
and I didn't even get his name.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_001_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_OLD_001_CUT_000_010.text:
But say, this looks a lot like
the treasure box from the fairy
tale of Taro Urashima! Yeah, I remember that. Fella saves a sea turtle
and gets invited to visit a princess of the sea,
but after spending a few days with her, he went
home and found centuries had passed. Oh, and the princess gave him a treasure box
and told him not to open it, but when he did,
he turned into an old man. And now I got me a box here.
Hmm... What to do...

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Connection_Operator
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Alert! Alert! An unapproved external
connection has been made from outside
the connectivity gate.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Impossible. No one has forced their
way through the connectivity gate
for 15,462 cycles.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Connection_Boss
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_03.text:
External lock disengaged.
Our commands are being overridden.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_04.text:
All security teams, assemble at the
connectivity gate! Anti-alien protocols
have been initiated!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_00.text:
Oh hey, just a normal door this time.
That's a nice change.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_02.text:
Guess that door's the only normal thing
here—although I suppose asking some fella
who just broke into the place to hold up
is also a pretty normal response...

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_03.text:
Scanning. Trespasser does not match
known records of Delta Base members.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_04.text:
Wait, are you talking
about me there, guy?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_05.text:
The alien will be interrogated by the
Council of Overseers. They will decide
the means of its disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_010_06.text:
...Disposal?
Don't like the sound of that.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_00.text:
The fate of captive aliens is determined
by the Detention Division. With infiltrating
aliens, however, the Council of Overseers
has jurisdiction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_01.text: And if we fail to reach consensus?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_02.text:
If you entrust the matter to
the Administrative Division,
we will handle disposal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal sounds good to me—where does trash
belong but in the trash can? Then we can pretend
this unapproved external connection never
happened and all walk away happy.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_04.text:
If we simply ignore what happened,
it could easily pave the way to
our own destruction.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_05.text:
This incident also calls our own ethics into
question. How can we allow ourselves to intrude
upon other worlds if we refuse to grant the
same privilege to others?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_06.text:
Oh, okay. So you two lofty overseers think
it's just peachy keen to let this alien
run around harassing us? The thing won't shut up about finding
'spirits' here, which we all know to
be complete and utter nonsense!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_07.text:
Alien, if you know spirits exist on
Delta Base, I would have you share
your evidence with us.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_08.text:
Okay, so this is a little tricky to explain,
but whenever I'm guided by fate to a door
and it opens, it means that there are spirits
hanging around in that other world. Er, but I can't swear they're actually
IN your base deal here. They could be
outside it, maybe.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_09.text: I'm sorry. Outside the base? Ha ha ha! Did you hear that!?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_10.text:
Delta Base has no 'outside,' alien.
The only thing connected to the exterior
is the door you came through.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_11.text:
Guess that means the spirits
are in here someplace then. So how about you let me poke around
a little? Once I find 'em, I'll get out
of your hair and leave you to it.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_12.text:
Oh, suuure! We'll just let an alien
wander freely around Delta Base
doing whatever it pleases! I don't know where you come from,
alien, but we have rules here!
Very important rules!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_13.text:
Would it be acceptable to assign him
a monitor? Yellow Division excels at
cross-cultural communication, yes?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_14.text:
A monitor without the capability
to fight would serve no purpose.
It should come from Red Division.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_15.text:
Sure, we can fight—but no one
actually knows the rules better
than the Administrative Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_16.text:
The Council of Overseers has reached its
decision. The Administrative Division will
assign a monitor to the alien, and he
will be allowed to search for spirits.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_020_17.text:
Understood. As the Administrative
Division's representative, I will
assign a monitor to the alien.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_00.text:
I'm Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I ask that you complete your task quickly,
alien, as I have little free time to spare.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_CUT_030_01.text:
So this is Delta Base, eh? I dig the whole
sci-fi deal they've got going on, but probably
best to find my spirits and get the heck
out of here quick as I can.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Council of Overseers has granted
you permission to search for spirits—
and that is all you are allowed to do.
Is this understood?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Heck, bud, how about you tell that to the
folks at the other divisions if it's got your
undies in such a twist? I'm just doing
what they're asking me to, yeah?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
The Administrative Division does not interfere
in the business of other divisions. Ours is a
support role only, and I lack the authority
to issue orders.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Have you truly come here for the purpose
of finding spirits? Because I sense very
little energy being devoted to that task.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Look, fella, I'd love to find a spirit and
swing on outta here, but I keep getting
asked to help with all sorts of other things! Never have been much good at
telling folks 'no,' I guess.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I understand this sentiment. The Administrative
Division is also constantly fielding requests
from the other divisions while asking nothing
in return.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps it's time you got serious
about this spirit search of yours.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I hear you there, guy—but I can't quite shake
the feeling I've still got a little something
to take care of around here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
If this is your attitude, you should consider
joining the Administrative Division—although
I can't say I've ever heard of us employing
outsiders before.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Explain yourself, alien. Why have the
other divisions had nothing but trouble
from the moment you arrived?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
I oughta be asking you that, fella,
because I just keep getting dragged
from one crazy situation to another! Delta Base is one world I'm never
gonna forget, believe you me.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_000_CUT_0.text:
Well, I suppose that is not such a bad thing—
though perhaps this is simply what happens
when you dilly-dally on your supposedly urgent
spirit search. Now pick up the pace, alien!

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
I did not wish to go to the lower level,
so please explain why I am being made to
do so. Is one of your spirits down there?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
Gosh, this lower level place sounds bad.
Is it dangerous, maybe? Or filthy?
Lots of spiders and all that?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_000_CUT_000.text:
It is both dangerous and dirty, and not
a place for an administrator like myself.
Conclude your business there quickly.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
I could avoid visiting the awful lower
level altogether had you managed to find
one of your spirits during one of your
previous trips there.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
Yeah, there's all sorts of stuff going
on in that lower level place—I can't
even begin to figure it all out.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_CENTERLIFT_010_CUT_000.text:
The other divisions are free to use the
lower level as they please, which is why
we do only the minimum amount of
necessary maintenance there. I hope you will complete
your work in short order.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
All right, fella. I acquired
the power of a metal spirit.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
Then it's finally done? A relief.
Let us return to the upper level
as quickly as possible.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_GET_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000.text:
All that's left for me now
is to head on home.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for all your help—I never would've
found that spirit without you. So I guess this is goodbye, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Yeah no, I'll be fine. Thanks though. But tell me this, guy: you ever been to
the Heavens? Or have you ever gone through
that door, is I guess what I mean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Members of the Administrative Division
do not leave Delta Base.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_040.text:
And you've never been tempted?
You know, just poke around and
see what's goin' on outside?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_060.text:
I have served the same role in the
Administrative Division since the moment
I was born, and will continue to do so
until all my higher functions cease. It took 8,000 cycles before I was promoted and
made an administrator—which is regarded as an
unusually fast ascent—and I have now served
as said administrator for over 5,000 cycles.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_070.text:
But this 'outside' of yours.
Is it...fun?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_080.text:
Well, I don't really know how to compare it
to Delta Base, but I sure as heck enjoy it.
Living on the outside, I mean.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_090.text:
You seem pretty keen to tag along with me,
fella. But if you wanna do that, you better
shake a leg. Er, or whatever you have.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Understood. I will accompany
you and see the outside.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Thanks for all your help—I never would've
found that spirit without you. So I guess this is goodbye, yeah?

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Wait. If you do not connect to the gate
with great care, you will end up lost
in the Conjoined Worlds. Stay here and I will summon assistance
from the Administrative Division overseer.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_020.text: Yeah no, I'll be fine. Thanks though.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_030.text:
The alien has departed.
What an unusual life-form.

SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Chief_Manager
SUB_W10_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_010_CUT_000_040.text:
You will now return to your
normal duties, Administrator Gold.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_02.text:
I guess the door's the only
thing that's normal here.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_03.text:
Entry not found in Delta Base registry.
Alien status confirmed.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.speaker: Base_Sheriff
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_05.text:
Aliens must be monitored at all times.
Please follow all applicable rules.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_010_06.text:
Hey, you got it, fella.
By the way, where are we?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, your assigned monitor.
I hear you have come in search of 'spirits.'
Do such things truly exist here?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_010_CUT_030_02.text:
In that case, I ask that you find
them quickly, for I am very busy. My coworkers are envious of my having been
given the 'easy' role of a monitor, but I fail
to see what is so enviable about it—for when it
is done, I will still have piles of missed work.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Pssst! You can trust me with your true secret
objective for coming here, alien. Are you a
spy sent from another base? Or a saboteur?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Boy, you folks must be real starved for
entertainment around here. You know
real life is never that interesting, right?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_100_CUT_0.text:
Oh? Well, but what about you having been
sent to us by another base? Was I correct
about that part?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_03.text:
Disposal? Are you nuts!?
That would be a huge waste! Look, I'm sure we can find some use for the alien.
Maybe it could teach in Yellow Division's Academy
of Foreign Cultures? Oh, or we could use it as
breeding stock for Green Division!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.speaker: YellowTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_04.text:
Yellow Division wants nothing
to do with this.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_05.text:
First of all, kindly stop referring to our
life-cycle research specimens as 'stock.'
Secondly, we have no plans of using the
alien in any of our research.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_06.text:
Seriously? You're gonna let a chance
like this slip through your fingers? Well, if you're really not interested,
I'm sure you won't object if we in
Red Division put the alien to good use!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_07.text:
Listen up, alien! Until you find your
little spirit or whatever it is you're
chasing, you can remain on Delta Base.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_08.text:
Assign him a caretaker from the
Administrative Division, would you?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_020_09.text:
A monitor, you mean?
Yes, he will require a monitor.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_00.text:
I am Administrator Gold, and I have been
assigned as your monitor. But as I have no
interest whatsoever in monitoring you,
feel free to do as you please.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_01.text:
You sure that's a good
idea there, guy?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_020_CUT_030_02.text:
Just don't cause any trouble. If anything
goes wrong, I'm the one who's going to
be chewed out by my bosses.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INTERMISSION_200_CUT_0.text: Good. That's what I like to hear.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.speaker: GreenTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_04.text: I find it to be surprisingly normal.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.speaker: RedTribe_Chief
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_08.text:
I hereby declare today to be Alien
Appreciation Day! Hip hip, huzzah!

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_010_09.text:
All right, that's more than enough of...
whatever this is. This alien isn't some
amusingly exotic species—it's a terribly
dangerous life-form. For all we know, it's swarming with germs
and pathogens. It may even seek to destroy
us through cultural pollution or weapons
of mass destruction that it smuggled in. But do not worry: the Administrative
Division is on top of the matter.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_00.text:
Greetings. I am Administrator Gold,
and I will be your attendant. ...Attendant to an alien. Wow.
I'm probably never going to
have a duty like this again.

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_01.text:
I take it outsiders don't pop
into Delta Base very often?

SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.speaker: Gold_SubManager
SUB_W10_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_030_CUT_030_02.text:
It has never happened in all the cycles I
have been here, which makes this all rather
exciting. So welcome to Delta Base, alien!
